00053 sub pre_header_initialize {
00054     my ($self) = @_;
00055     my $r = $self->r;
00056     my $ce = $r->ce;
00057     my $db = $r->db;
00058     my $authz = $r->authz;
00059     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00060     my $user        = $r->param('user');
00061     
00062     # check permissions
00063     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "create_and_delete_courses")) {
00064         $self->addmessage( CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'},"$user is not authorized to create or delete courses") );
00065         return;
00066     }
00067     
00068     # get result and send to message
00069     my $status_message = $r->param("status_message");
00070     $self->addmessage(CGI::p("$status_message")) if $status_message;
00071     
00072     
00073     # Check that the non-native tables are present in the database
00074     # These are the tables which are not course specific
00075     
00076     my $table_update_result = initNonNativeTables($ce, $ce->{dbLayoutName});
00077     
00078     $self->addgoodmessage(CGI::p("$table_update_result")) if $table_update_result;
00079     
00080     
00081     ## if the user is asking for the downloaded database...
00082     #if (defined $r->param("download_exported_database")) {
00083     #   my $courseID = $r->param("export_courseID");
00084     #   my $random_chars = $r->param("download_exported_database");
00085     #   
00086     #   die "courseID not specified" unless defined $courseID;
00087     #   die "invalid file specification" unless $random_chars =~ m/^\w+$/;
00088     #   
00089     #   my $tempdir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{tmp};
00090     #   my $export_file = "$tempdir/db_export_$random_chars";
00091     #   
00092     #   $self->reply_with_file("application/xml", $export_file, "${courseID}_database.xml", 0);
00093     #   
00094     #   return "";
00095     #}
00096     #
00097     ## otherwise...
00098     
00099     my @errors;
00100     my $method_to_call;
00101     
00102     my $subDisplay = $r->param("subDisplay");
00103     if (defined $subDisplay) {
00104     
00105         if ($subDisplay eq "add_course") {
00106             if (defined $r->param("add_course")) {
00107                 @errors = $self->add_course_validate;
00108                 if (@errors) {
00109                     $method_to_call = "add_course_form";
00110                 } else {
00111                     $method_to_call = "do_add_course";
00112                 }
00113             } else {
00114                 $method_to_call = "add_course_form";
00115             }
00116         }
00117         
00118         elsif ($subDisplay eq "rename_course") {
00119             if (defined $r->param("rename_course")) {
00120                 @errors = $self->rename_course_validate;
00121                 if (@errors) {
00122                     $method_to_call = "rename_course_form";
00123                 } else {
00124                     $method_to_call = "rename_course_confirm";
00125                 }
00126             } elsif (defined $r->param("confirm_rename_course")) {
00127                 # validate and delete
00128                 @errors = $self->rename_course_validate;
00129                 if (@errors) {
00130                     $method_to_call = "rename_course_form";
00131                 } else {
00132                     $method_to_call = "do_rename_course";
00133                 }
00134             } elsif (defined $r->param("upgrade_course_tables") ){
00135                 # upgrade and revalidate
00136                 @errors = $self->rename_course_validate;
00137                 if (@errors) {
00138                     $method_to_call = "rename_course_form";
00139                 } else {
00140                     $method_to_call = "rename_course_confirm";
00141                 }
00142 
00143             } else {
00144                 $method_to_call = "rename_course_form";
00145             }
00146         }
00147         
00148         elsif ($subDisplay eq "delete_course") {
00149             if (defined $r->param("delete_course")) {
00150                 # validate or confirm
00151                 @errors = $self->delete_course_validate;
00152                 if (@errors) {
00153                     $method_to_call = "delete_course_form";
00154                 } else {
00155                     $method_to_call = "delete_course_confirm";
00156                 }
00157             } elsif (defined $r->param("confirm_delete_course")) {
00158                 # validate and delete
00159                 @errors = $self->delete_course_validate;
00160                 if (@errors) {
00161                     $method_to_call = "delete_course_form";
00162                 } else {
00163                     $method_to_call = "do_delete_course";
00164                 }
00165             }   
00166             elsif (defined ($r->param("delete_course_refresh"))) {
00167                 $method_to_call = "delete_course_form";
00168             } else {
00169                 # form only
00170                 $method_to_call = "delete_course_form";
00171             }
00172         }
00173         
00174         elsif ($subDisplay eq "export_database") {
00175             if (defined $r->param("export_database")) {
00176                 @errors = $self->export_database_validate;
00177                 if (@errors) {
00178                     $method_to_call = "export_database_form";
00179                 } else {
00180                     # we have to do something special here, since we're sending
00181                     # the database as we export it. $method_to_call still gets
00182                     # set here, but it gets caught by header() and content()
00183                     # below instead of by body().
00184                     $method_to_call = "do_export_database";
00185                 }
00186             } else {
00187                 $method_to_call = "export_database_form";
00188             }
00189         }
00190         
00191         elsif ($subDisplay eq "import_database") {
00192             if (defined $r->param("import_database")) {
00193                 @errors = $self->import_database_validate;
00194                 if (@errors) {
00195                     $method_to_call = "import_database_form";
00196                 } else {
00197                     $method_to_call = "do_import_database";
00198                 }
00199             } else {
00200                 $method_to_call = "import_database_form";
00201             }
00202         }
00203         
00204         elsif ($subDisplay eq "archive_course") {
00205             if (defined $r->param("archive_course")) {
00206                 # validate -- if invalid, start over.
00207                 # if form is valid a page indicating the status of 
00208                 # database tables and directories is presented.
00209                 # If they are ok, then you can push archive button, otherwise
00210                 # you can quit or choose to upgrade the tables
00211                 @errors = $self->archive_course_validate;
00212                 if (@errors) {
00213                     $method_to_call = "archive_course_form";
00214                 } else {
00215                     $method_to_call = "archive_course_confirm"; #check tables & directories
00216                 }
00217             } elsif (defined $r->param("confirm_archive_course")) {
00218                 # validate and archive
00219                 # the "archive it" button has been pushed and the 
00220                 # course will be archived
00221                 # a report on success or failure will be generated
00222                 @errors = $self->archive_course_validate;
00223                 if (@errors) {
00224                     $method_to_call = "archive_course_form";
00225                 } else {
00226                     $method_to_call = "do_archive_course";
00227                 }
00228             } elsif (defined $r->param("upgrade_course_tables") ){
00229                 # upgrade and revalidate
00230                 # the "upgrade course" button has been pushed
00231                 # after the course has been upgraded you are returned
00232                 # to the confirm page.
00233                 @errors = $self->archive_course_validate;
00234                 if (@errors) {
00235                     $method_to_call = "archive_course_form";
00236                 } else {
00237                     $method_to_call = "archive_course_confirm"; # upgrade and recheck tables & directories.
00238                 }
00239             }   
00240             elsif (defined ($r->param("archive_course_refresh"))) {
00241                 $method_to_call = "archive_course_form";
00242             } else {
00243                 # form only
00244                 $method_to_call = "archive_course_form";
00245             }
00246         }
00247         elsif ($subDisplay eq "unarchive_course") {
00248             if (defined $r->param("unarchive_course")) {
00249                 # validate or confirm
00250                 @errors = $self->unarchive_course_validate;
00251                 if (@errors) {
00252                     $method_to_call = "unarchive_course_form";
00253                 } else {
00254                     $method_to_call = "unarchive_course_confirm";
00255                 }
00256             } elsif (defined $r->param("confirm_unarchive_course")) {
00257                 # validate and archive
00258                 @errors = $self->unarchive_course_validate;
00259                 if (@errors) {
00260                     $method_to_call = "unarchive_course_form";
00261                 } else {
00262                     $method_to_call = "do_unarchive_course";
00263                 }
00264             } else {
00265                 # form only
00266                 # start at the beginning -- get drop down list of courses to unarchive
00267                 $method_to_call = "unarchive_course_form";
00268             }
00269         }
00270         elsif ($subDisplay eq "upgrade_course") {
00271             if (defined $r->param("upgrade_course")) {
00272                 # validate or confirm
00273                 # if form is valid present details of analysis of the course structure
00274                 @errors = $self->upgrade_course_validate;
00275                 if (@errors) {
00276                     $method_to_call = "upgrade_course_form";
00277                 } else {
00278                     $method_to_call = "upgrade_course_confirm";
00279                 }
00280             } elsif (defined $r->param("confirm_upgrade_course")) {
00281                 # validate and upgrade
00282                 # if form is valid upgrade the courses and present results
00283                 @errors = $self->upgrade_course_validate;
00284                 if (@errors) {
00285                     $method_to_call = "upgrade_course_form";
00286                 } else {
00287                     $method_to_call = "do_upgrade_course";
00288                 }
00289             } else {
00290                 # form only
00291                 # start at the beginning -- get list of courses and their status
00292                 $method_to_call = "upgrade_course_form";
00293             }
00294         }
00295         elsif ($subDisplay eq "manage_locations") {
00296             if (defined ($r->param("manage_location_action"))) {
00297                 $method_to_call = 
00298                     $r->param("manage_location_action");
00299             }
00300             else{
00301                 $method_to_call = "manage_location_form";
00302             }
00303         }
00304         elsif ($subDisplay eq "hide_inactive_course") {
00305 #           warn "subDisplay is $subDisplay";
00306             if (defined ($r->param("hide_course"))) {
00307                 @errors = $self->hide_course_validate;
00308                 if (@errors) {
00309                     $method_to_call = "hide_inactive_course_form";
00310                 } else {
00311                 $method_to_call = "do_hide_inactive_course";
00312               }
00313             }  
00314             elsif (defined ($r->param("unhide_course"))) {
00315                 @errors = $self->unhide_course_validate;
00316                 if (@errors) {
00317                     $method_to_call = "hide_inactive_course_form";
00318                 } else {
00319                 $method_to_call = "do_unhide_inactive_course";
00320               }
00321             } 
00322             elsif (defined ($r->param("hide_course_refresh"))) {
00323                 $method_to_call = "hide_inactive_course_form";
00324             }
00325             else{
00326                 $method_to_call = "hide_inactive_course_form";
00327             }
00328         }       
00329         elsif ($subDisplay eq "registration") {
00330             if (defined ($r->param("register_site"))) {
00331                 $method_to_call =  "do_registration";
00332             }
00333             else{
00334                 $method_to_call = "registration_form";
00335             }
00336         }
00337         else {
00338             @errors = "Unrecognized sub-display @{[ CGI::b($subDisplay) ]}.";
00339         }
00340     }
00341     
00342     $self->{errors} = \@errors;
00343     $self->{method_to_call} = $method_to_call;
00344 }

00369 sub content {
00370     my ($self) = @_;
00371     my $method_to_call = $self->{method_to_call};
00372     if (defined $method_to_call and $method_to_call eq "do_export_database") {
00373         #$self->do_export_database;
00374         $self->SUPER::content;
00375     } else {
00376         $self->SUPER::content;
00377     }
00378 }

00380 sub body {
00381     my ($self) = @_;
00382     my $r = $self->r;
00383     my $ce = $r->ce;
00384     my $db = $r->db;
00385     my $authz = $r->authz;
00386     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00387     
00388     my $user = $r->param('user');
00389     
00390     # check permissions
00391     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "create_and_delete_courses")) {
00392         return "";
00393     }
00394     my $method_to_call = $self->{method_to_call};
00395     my $methodMessage ="";
00396     
00397     (defined($method_to_call) and $method_to_call eq "do_export_database") && do {
00398         my @export_courseID = $r->param("export_courseID");
00399         my $course_ids = join(", ", @export_courseID);
00400         $methodMessage  = CGI::p("Exporting database for course(s) $course_ids").
00401         CGI::p(".... please wait.... 
00402         If your browser times out you will
00403         still be able to download the exported database using the 
00404         file manager.").CGI::hr();
00405     };
00406     
00407     
00408     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
00409         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"add_course",add_admin_users=>1,
00410                    add_dbLayout=>'sql_single', 
00411                    add_templates_course => $ce->{siteDefaults}->{default_templates_course} ||""}
00412                    )}, 
00413                    "Add Course"
00414         ),
00415         " | ",
00416         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"rename_course"})}, "Rename Course"),
00417         " | ",
00418         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"delete_course"})}, "Delete Course"),
00419         " | ",
00420         # CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"export_database"})}, "Export Database"),
00421         # " | ",
00422         # CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"import_database"})}, "Import Database"),
00423         # " | ",
00424         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"archive_course"})}, "Archive Course"),
00425          "|",
00426         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"unarchive_course"})}, "Unarchive Course"),
00427          "|",
00428         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"upgrade_course"})}, "Upgrade courses"),
00429          "|",
00430         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"manage_locations"})}, "Manage Locations"),
00431          "|",
00432         CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"hide_inactive_course"})}, "Hide Inactive courses"),
00433         CGI::hr(),
00434         $methodMessage,
00435         
00436     );
00437     
00438     print( CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, $self->display_registration_form() ) ) if $self->display_registration_form();
00439     
00440     
00441     my @errors = @{$self->{errors}};
00442     
00443     
00444     if (@errors) {
00445         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00446             CGI::p("Please correct the following errors and try again:"),
00447             CGI::ul(CGI::li(\@errors)),
00448         );
00449     }
00450     
00451     if (defined $method_to_call and $method_to_call ne "") {
00452         $self->$method_to_call;
00453     } else {
00454             my $msg = "";
00455             $msg .= CGI::li("unable to write to directory $ce->{webworkDirs}{logs}")  unless -w $ce->{webworkDirs}{logs}; 
00456             $msg .=  CGI::li("unable to write to directory $ce->{webworkDirs}{tmp}" )  unless -w $ce->{webworkDirs}{tmp}; 
00457             $msg .=  CGI::li("unable to write to directory $ce->{webworkDirs}{DATA}")  unless -w $ce->{webworkDirs}{DATA}; 
00458             if ($msg) {
00459                 print CGI::h2("Directory permission errors ").CGI::ul($msg).
00460                 CGI::p(" The webwork server must be able to write to these directories. Please correct the permssion errors.") ;
00461             }
00462     
00463         print CGI::h2("Courses");
00464     
00465         print CGI::start_ol();
00466         
00467         my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
00468         foreach my $courseID (sort {lc($a) cmp lc($b) } @courseIDs) {
00469             next if $courseID eq "admin"; # done already above
00470             next if $courseID eq "modelCourse"; # modelCourse isn't a real course so don't create missing directories, etc
00471             my $urlpath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r, courseID => $courseID);
00472             print CGI::li(CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, authen => 0)}, $courseID));
00473         }
00474         
00475         print CGI::end_ol();
00476         
00477         print CGI::h2("Archived Courses");
00478         print CGI::start_ol();
00479         
00480         @courseIDs = listArchivedCourses($ce);
00481         foreach my $courseID (sort {lc($a) cmp lc($b) } @courseIDs) {
00482             print CGI::li($courseID),    
00483         }
00484         
00485         print CGI::end_ol();
00486     }
00487     return "";
00488 }

00492 sub add_course_form {
00493     my ($self) = @_;
00494     my $r = $self->r;
00495     my $ce = $r->ce;
00496     #my $db = $r->db;
00497     #my $authz = $r->authz;
00498     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00499     
00500     my $add_courseID                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseID") ) || "";
00501     my $add_courseTitle                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseTitle") ) || "";
00502     my $add_courseInstitution            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseInstitution") ) || "";
00503     
00504     my $add_admin_users                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_admin_users") ) || "";
00505     
00506     my $add_initial_userID               = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_userID") ) || "";
00507     my $add_initial_password             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_password") ) || "";
00508     my $add_initial_confirmPassword      = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_confirmPassword") ) || "";
00509     my $add_initial_firstName            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_firstName") ) || "";
00510     my $add_initial_lastName             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_lastName") ) || "";
00511     my $add_initial_email                = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_email") ) || "";
00512     
00513     my $add_templates_course             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_templates_course") ) || "";
00514     
00515     my $add_dbLayout                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_dbLayout") ) || "";
00516     
00517 
00518 
00519 
00520     my @dbLayouts = do {
00521         my @ordered_layouts;
00522         foreach my $layout (@{$ce->{dbLayout_order}}) {
00523             if (exists $ce->{dbLayouts}->{$layout}) {
00524                 push @ordered_layouts, $layout;
00525             }
00526         }
00527         
00528         my %ordered_layouts; @ordered_layouts{@ordered_layouts} = ();
00529         my @other_layouts;
00530         foreach my $layout (keys %{ $ce->{dbLayouts} }) {
00531             unless (exists $ordered_layouts{$layout}) {
00532                 push @other_layouts, $layout;
00533             }
00534         }
00535         
00536         (@ordered_layouts, @other_layouts);
00537     };
00538     
00539     # unused...
00540     #my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
00541     #   %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
00542     #   courseName => "COURSENAME",
00543     #});
00544     
00545     my @existingCourses = listCourses($ce);
00546     @existingCourses = sort { lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @existingCourses; #make sort case insensitive 
00547     
00548     print CGI::h2("Add Course");
00549     
00550     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
00551     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00552     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
00553     
00554     print CGI::p("Specify an ID, title, and institution for the new course. The course ID may contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.");
00555     
00556     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00557         CGI::Tr({},
00558             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course ID:"),
00559             CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_courseID", -value=>$add_courseID, -size=>25)),
00560         ),
00561         CGI::Tr({},
00562             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course Title:"),
00563             CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_courseTitle", -value=>$add_courseTitle, -size=>25)),
00564         ),
00565         CGI::Tr({},
00566             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Institution:"),
00567             CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_courseInstitution", -value=>$add_courseInstitution, -size=>25)),
00568         ),
00569     );
00570     
00571     print CGI::p("To add the WeBWorK administrators to the new course (as instructors) check the box below.");
00572     my @checked = ($add_admin_users) ?(checked=>1): ();  # workaround because CGI::checkbox seems to have a bug -- it won't default to checked.
00573     print CGI::p({},CGI::input({-type=>'checkbox', -name=>"add_admin_users", @checked }, "Add WeBWorK administrators to new course"));
00574     
00575     print CGI::p("To add an additional instructor to the new course, specify user information below. The user ID may contain only 
00576     numbers, letters, hyphens, periods (dots), commas,and underscores.\n");
00577     
00578     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"}, CGI::Tr({},
00579         CGI::td({},
00580             CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00581                 CGI::Tr({},
00582                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "User ID:"),
00583                     CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_initial_userID", -value=>$add_initial_userID, -size=>25)),
00584                 ),
00585                 CGI::Tr({},
00586                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Password:"),
00587                     CGI::td(CGI::password_field(-name=>"add_initial_password", -value=>$add_initial_password, -size=>25)),
00588                 ),
00589                 CGI::Tr({},
00590                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Confirm Password:"),
00591                     CGI::td(CGI::password_field(-name=>"add_initial_confirmPassword", -value=>$add_initial_confirmPassword, -size=>25)),
00592                 ),
00593             ),
00594         ),
00595         CGI::td({},
00596             CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00597                 CGI::Tr({},
00598                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "First Name:"),
00599                     CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_initial_firstName", -value=>$add_initial_firstName, -size=>25)),
00600                 ),
00601                 CGI::Tr({},
00602                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Last Name:"),
00603                     CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_initial_lastName", -value=>$add_initial_lastName, -size=>25)),
00604                 ),
00605                 CGI::Tr({},
00606                     CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Email Address:"),
00607                     CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"add_initial_email", -value=>$add_initial_email, -size=>25)),
00608                 ),
00609             ),
00610             
00611         ),
00612     ));
00613     
00614     print CGI::p("To copy problem templates from an existing course, select the course below.");
00615     
00616     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00617         CGI::Tr({},
00618             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Copy templates from:"),
00619             CGI::td(
00620                 CGI::popup_menu(
00621                     -name => "add_templates_course",
00622                     -values => [ "", @existingCourses ],
00623                     -default => $add_templates_course,
00624                     #-size => 10,
00625                     #-multiple => 0,
00626                     #-labels => \%courseLabels,
00627                 ),
00628 
00629             ),
00630         ),
00631     );
00632     
00633     
00634     
00635     print CGI::p("Select a database layout below.");
00636     print CGI::start_table({class=>"FormLayout"});
00637     
00638     my %dbLayout_buttons;
00639     my $selected_dbLayout = defined $add_dbLayout ? $add_dbLayout : $ce->{dbLayout_order}[0];
00640     @dbLayout_buttons{@dbLayouts} = CGI::radio_group(-name=>"add_dbLayout",-values=>\@dbLayouts,-default=>$selected_dbLayout);
00641     foreach my $dbLayout (@dbLayouts) {
00642         my $dbLayoutLabel = (defined $ce->{dbLayout_descr}{$dbLayout})
00643             ? "$dbLayout - " . $ce->{dbLayout_descr}{$dbLayout}
00644             : "$dbLayout - no description provided in global.conf";
00645         print CGI::Tr({},
00646             CGI::td({width=>'20%'}, $dbLayout_buttons{$dbLayout}),
00647             CGI::td($dbLayoutLabel),
00648         );
00649     }
00650     print CGI::end_table();
00651     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: left"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"add_course", -label=>"Add Course"));
00652     
00653     print CGI::end_form();
00654 }
00655 
00656 sub add_course_validate {
00657     my ($self) = @_;
00658     my $r = $self->r;
00659     my $ce = $r->ce;
00660     #my $db = $r->db;
00661     #my $authz = $r->authz;
00662     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00663     
00664 
00665     my $add_courseID                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseID") ) || "";
00666     my $add_courseTitle                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseTitle") ) || "";
00667     my $add_courseInstitution            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseInstitution") ) || "";
00668     
00669     my $add_admin_users                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_admin_users") ) || "";
00670     
00671     my $add_initial_userID               = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_userID") ) || "";
00672     my $add_initial_password             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_password") ) || "";
00673     my $add_initial_confirmPassword      = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_confirmPassword") ) || "";
00674     my $add_initial_firstName            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_firstName") ) || "";
00675     my $add_initial_lastName             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_lastName") ) || "";
00676     my $add_initial_email                = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_email") ) || "";
00677     my $add_templates_course             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_templates_course") ) || "";
00678     my $add_dbLayout                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_dbLayout") ) || "";
00679     
00680     
00681 
00682     
00683     ######################
00684     
00685     my @errors;
00686     
00687     if ($add_courseID eq "") {
00688         push @errors, "You must specify a course ID.";
00689     }
00690     unless ($add_courseID =~ /^[\w-]*$/) { # regex copied from CourseAdministration.pm
00691         push @errors, "Course ID may only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.";
00692     }
00693     if (grep { $add_courseID eq $_ } listCourses($ce)) {
00694         push @errors, "A course with ID $add_courseID already exists.";
00695     }
00696     #if ($add_courseTitle eq "") {
00697     #   push @errors, "You must specify a course title.";
00698     #}
00699     #if ($add_courseInstitution eq "") {
00700     #   push @errors, "You must specify an institution for this course.";
00701     #}
00702     
00703     if ($add_initial_userID ne "") {
00704         if ($add_initial_password eq "") {
00705             push @errors, "You must specify a password for the initial instructor.";
00706         }
00707         if ($add_initial_confirmPassword eq "") {
00708             push @errors, "You must confirm the password for the initial instructor.";
00709         }
00710         if ($add_initial_password ne $add_initial_confirmPassword) {
00711             push @errors, "The password and password confirmation for the instructor must match.";
00712         }
00713         if ($add_initial_firstName eq "") {
00714             push @errors, "You must specify a first name for the initial instructor.";
00715         }
00716         if ($add_initial_lastName eq "") {
00717             push @errors, "You must specify a last name for the initial instructor.";
00718         }
00719         if ($add_initial_email eq "") {
00720             push @errors, "You must specify an email address for the initial instructor.";
00721         }
00722     }
00723     
00724     if ($add_dbLayout eq "") {
00725         push @errors, "You must select a database layout.";
00726     } else {
00727         if (exists $ce->{dbLayouts}->{$add_dbLayout}) {
00728             # we used to check for layout-specific fields here, but there aren't any layouts that require them
00729             # anymore. (in the future, we'll probably deal with this in layout-specific modules.)
00730         } else {
00731             push @errors, "The database layout $add_dbLayout doesn't exist.";
00732         }
00733     }
00734     
00735     return @errors;
00736 }
00737 
00738 sub do_add_course {
00739     my ($self) = @_;
00740     my $r = $self->r;
00741     my $ce = $r->ce;
00742     my $db = $r->db;
00743     my $authz = $r->authz;
00744     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00745     
00746     my $add_courseID                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseID") ) || "";
00747     my $add_courseTitle                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseTitle") ) || "";
00748     my $add_courseInstitution            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_courseInstitution") ) || "";
00749     
00750     my $add_admin_users                  = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_admin_users") ) || "";
00751     
00752     my $add_initial_userID               = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_userID") ) || "";
00753     my $add_initial_password             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_password") ) || "";
00754     my $add_initial_confirmPassword      = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_confirmPassword") ) || "";
00755     my $add_initial_firstName            = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_firstName") ) || "";
00756     my $add_initial_lastName             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_lastName") ) || "";
00757     my $add_initial_email                = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_initial_email") ) || "";
00758     
00759     my $add_templates_course             = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_templates_course") ) || "";
00760     
00761     my $add_dbLayout                     = trim_spaces( $r->param("add_dbLayout") ) || "";
00762     
00763     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
00764         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
00765         courseName => $add_courseID,
00766     });
00767     
00768     my %courseOptions = ( dbLayoutName => $add_dbLayout );
00769     
00770     if ($add_initial_email ne "") {
00771         $courseOptions{allowedRecipients} = [ $add_initial_email ];
00772         # don't set feedbackRecipients -- this just gets in the way of the more
00773         # intelligent "receive_recipients" method.
00774         #$courseOptions{feedbackRecipients} = [ $add_initial_email ];
00775     }
00776     
00777     # this is kinda left over from when we had 'gdbm' and 'sql' database layouts
00778     # below this line, we would grab values from getopt and put them in this hash
00779     # but for now the hash can remain empty
00780     my %dbOptions;
00781     
00782     my @users;
00783     
00784     # copy users from current (admin) course if desired
00785     if ($add_admin_users ne "") {
00786         foreach my $userID ($db->listUsers) {
00787             if ($userID eq $add_initial_userID) {
00788                 $self->addbadmessage( "User '$userID' will not be copied from admin course as it is the initial instructor.");
00789                 next;
00790             }
00791             my $User            = $db->getUser($userID);
00792             my $Password        = $db->getPassword($userID);
00793             my $PermissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($userID);
00794             push @users, [ $User, $Password, $PermissionLevel ] 
00795                    if $authz->hasPermissions($userID,"create_and_delete_courses");  
00796                    #only transfer the "instructors" in the admin course classlist.
00797         }
00798     }
00799     
00800     # add initial instructor if desired
00801     if ($add_initial_userID ne "") {
00802         my $User = $db->newUser(
00803             user_id       => $add_initial_userID,
00804             first_name    => $add_initial_firstName,
00805             last_name     => $add_initial_lastName,
00806             student_id    => $add_initial_userID,
00807             email_address => $add_initial_email,
00808             status        => "C",
00809         );
00810         my $Password = $db->newPassword(
00811             user_id  => $add_initial_userID,
00812             password => cryptPassword($add_initial_password),
00813         );
00814         my $PermissionLevel = $db->newPermissionLevel(
00815             user_id    => $add_initial_userID,
00816             permission => "10",
00817         );
00818         push @users, [ $User, $Password, $PermissionLevel ];
00819     }
00820     
00821     push @{$courseOptions{PRINT_FILE_NAMES_FOR}}, map { $_->[0]->user_id } @users;
00822     
00823     my %optional_arguments;
00824     if ($add_templates_course ne "") {
00825         $optional_arguments{templatesFrom} = $add_templates_course;
00826     }
00827     
00828     eval {
00829         addCourse(
00830             courseID      => $add_courseID,
00831             ce            => $ce2,
00832             courseOptions => \%courseOptions,
00833             dbOptions     => \%dbOptions,
00834             users         => \@users,
00835             %optional_arguments,
00836         );
00837     };
00838     if ($@) {
00839         my $error = $@;
00840         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00841             CGI::p("An error occured while creating the course $add_courseID:"),
00842             CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
00843         );
00844         # get rid of any partially built courses
00845         # FIXME  -- this is too fragile
00846         unless ($error =~ /course exists/) {
00847             eval {
00848                 deleteCourse(
00849                     courseID   => $add_courseID,
00850                     ce         => $ce2,
00851                     dbOptions  => \%dbOptions,
00852                 );
00853             }
00854         }
00855     } else {
00856         #log the action
00857         writeLog($ce, "hosted_courses", join("\t",
00858             "\tAdded",
00859             ( defined $add_courseInstitution ? $add_courseInstitution : "(no institution specified)" ),
00860             ( defined $add_courseTitle ? $add_courseTitle : "(no title specified)" ),
00861             $add_courseID,
00862             $add_initial_firstName,
00863             $add_initial_lastName,
00864             $add_initial_email,
00865         ));
00866         # add contact to admin course as student?
00867         # FIXME -- should we do this?
00868         if ($add_initial_userID ne "") {
00869             my $composite_id = "${add_initial_userID}_${add_courseID}"; # student id includes school name and contact
00870             my $User = $db->newUser(
00871             user_id       => $composite_id,          # student id includes school name and contact
00872             first_name    => $add_initial_firstName,
00873             last_name     => $add_initial_lastName,
00874             student_id    => $add_initial_userID,
00875             email_address => $add_initial_email,
00876             status        => "C",
00877             );
00878             my $Password = $db->newPassword(
00879                 user_id  => $composite_id,
00880                 password => cryptPassword($add_initial_password),
00881             );
00882             my $PermissionLevel = $db->newPermissionLevel(
00883                 user_id    => $composite_id,
00884                 permission => "0",
00885             );
00886             # add contact to admin course as student
00887             # or if this contact and course already exist in a dropped status
00888             # change the student's status to enrolled
00889             if (my $oldUser = $db->getUser($composite_id) ) {
00890                 warn "Replacing old data for $composite_id  status: ". $oldUser->status;
00891                 $db->deleteUser($composite_id);
00892             }
00893             eval { $db->addUser($User)                       }; warn $@ if $@;
00894             eval { $db->addPassword($Password)               }; warn $@ if $@;
00895             eval { $db->addPermissionLevel($PermissionLevel) }; warn $@ if $@;
00896         }
00897         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
00898             CGI::p("Successfully created the course $add_courseID"),
00899         );
00900         my $newCoursePath = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r,
00901             courseID => $add_courseID);
00902         my $newCourseURL = $self->systemLink($newCoursePath, authen => 0);
00903         print CGI::div({style=>"text-align: center"},
00904             CGI::a({href=>$newCourseURL}, "Log into $add_courseID"),
00905         );
00906     }
00907 
00908     
00909 }
00910 
00911 ################################################################################
00912 
00913 sub rename_course_form {
00914     my ($self) = @_;
00915     my $r = $self->r;
00916     my $ce = $r->ce;
00917     #my $db = $r->db;
00918     #my $authz = $r->authz;
00919     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00920     
00921     my $rename_oldCourseID     = $r->param("rename_oldCourseID")     || "";
00922     my $rename_newCourseID     = $r->param("rename_newCourseID")     || "";
00923     
00924     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
00925     @courseIDs    = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs;
00926     
00927     my %courseLabels; # records... heh.
00928     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
00929 #       my $tempCE = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
00930 #           %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
00931 #           courseName => $courseID,
00932 #       });
00933 #       $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID (" . $tempCE->{dbLayoutName} . ")";
00934         $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID";
00935     }
00936     
00937     print CGI::h2("Rename Course");
00938     
00939     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
00940     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00941     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
00942     
00943     print CGI::p("Select a course to rename.");
00944     
00945     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00946         CGI::Tr({},
00947             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course Name:"),
00948             CGI::td(
00949                 CGI::scrolling_list(
00950                     -name => "rename_oldCourseID",
00951                     -values => \@courseIDs,
00952                     -default => $rename_oldCourseID,
00953                     -size => 10,
00954                     -multiple => 0,
00955                     -labels => \%courseLabels,
00956                 ),
00957             ),
00958         ),
00959         CGI::Tr({},
00960             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "New Name:"),
00961             CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"rename_newCourseID", -value=>$rename_newCourseID, -size=>25)),
00962         ),
00963     );
00964     
00965     print CGI::end_table();
00966     
00967     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"rename_course", -label=>"Rename Course"));
00968     
00969     print CGI::end_form();
00970 }
00971 sub rename_course_confirm {
00972 
00973     my ($self) = @_;
00974     my $r = $self->r;
00975     my $ce = $r->ce;
00976     #my $db = $r->db;
00977     #my $authz = $r->authz;
00978     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00979 
00980     my $rename_oldCourseID     = $r->param("rename_oldCourseID")     || "";
00981     my $rename_newCourseID     = $r->param("rename_newCourseID")     || "";
00982 
00983     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
00984         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
00985         courseName => $rename_oldCourseID,
00986     });
00987 #############################################################################
00988 # Check database
00989 #############################################################################
00990     
00991     my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus);
00992     if ($ce2->{dbLayoutName} ) {
00993          my $CIchecker = new WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck(ce=>$ce2);
00994         ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($rename_oldCourseID);
00995         if ($r->param("upgrade_course_tables")) {
00996             my @schema_table_names = keys %$dbStatus;  # update tables missing from database;
00997             my @tables_to_create = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A} @schema_table_names;
00998             my @tables_to_alter  = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B} @schema_table_names;
00999             my $msg = $CIchecker->updateCourseTables($rename_oldCourseID, [@tables_to_create]);
01000             foreach my $table_name (@tables_to_alter) {
01001                 $msg .= $CIchecker->updateTableFields($rename_oldCourseID, $table_name);
01002             }
01003             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:green; font-weight:bold'}, $msg);
01004             
01005         }
01006         ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($rename_oldCourseID);
01007  
01008 
01009         # print db status
01010 
01011         my %msg =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in schema but missing in database"),
01012                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in database but missing in schema"),
01013                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," Table is ok "),
01014                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database table definitions do not agree "),
01015         );
01016         my %msg2 =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A        => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in database"),
01017                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in schema"),
01018                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," is ok "),
01019                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database field definitions do not agree "),
01020         );
01021         my $all_tables_ok=1;
01022         my $extra_database_tables=0;
01023         my $extra_database_fields=0;
01024         my $str=CGI::h4("Report on database structure for course $rename_oldCourseID:").CGI::br();
01025         foreach my $table (sort keys %$dbStatus) {
01026             my $table_status = $dbStatus->{$table}->[0];
01027             $str .= CGI::b($table) .  $msg{ $table_status } . CGI::br();
01028             
01029             CASE: {
01030                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B 
01031                     && do{ last CASE;
01032                     };
01033                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A
01034                     && do{
01035                            $all_tables_ok = 0; last CASE;
01036                     };
01037                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B
01038                     && do{
01039                            $extra_database_tables = 1; last CASE;
01040                     };
01041                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B
01042                     && do{ 
01043                         my %fieldInfo = %{ $dbStatus->{$table}->[1] };
01044                         foreach my $key (keys %fieldInfo) {
01045                             my $field_status = $fieldInfo{$key}->[0];
01046                             CASE2: {
01047                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B 
01048                                     && do{ 
01049                                        $extra_database_fields = 1; last CASE2;
01050                                     };
01051                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A 
01052                                     && do{ 
01053                                        $all_tables_ok=0; last CASE2;
01054                                     };                          
01055                             }
01056                             $str .= CGI::br()."\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Field $key => ". $msg2{$field_status };
01057                         }                           
01058                     };
01059             }
01060             $str.=CGI::br();
01061             
01062         }
01063 #############################################################################
01064 # Report on databases
01065 #############################################################################
01066 
01067         print CGI::p($str);
01068         if ($extra_database_tables) {
01069                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database tables which are not defined in the schema.  
01070                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database. They will not be renamed.");
01071         } 
01072         if ($extra_database_fields) {
01073                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database fields  which are not defined in the schema for at least one table.  
01074                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database.");
01075         }       
01076         if ($all_tables_ok) {
01077             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:green; font-weight:bold'},"Course $rename_oldCourseID database is in order");
01078         } else {
01079             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'}, "Course $rename_oldCourseID databases must be updated before renaming this course.");
01080         }   
01081         
01082 #############################################################################
01083 # Check directories
01084 #############################################################################
01085 
01086 
01087       my ($directories_ok, $str2) = $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories($ce2);
01088       my $style = ($directories_ok)?"color:green" : "color:red";
01089       print CGI::h2("Directory structure"), CGI::p($str2),
01090       ($directories_ok)? CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is ok") :
01091               CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is missing directories 
01092                           or the webserver lacks sufficient privileges.");
01093     
01094 #############################################################################
01095 # Print form for choosing next action.
01096 #############################################################################
01097 
01098 
01099 
01100         print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01101         print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01102         print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01103         print $self->hidden_fields(qw/rename_oldCourseID rename_newCourseID/);
01104             # grab some values we'll need
01105         # fail if the source course does not exist
01106 
01107         
01108         
01109         if ($all_tables_ok && $directories_ok ) { # no missing tables or missing fields or directories
01110             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01111                 CGI::submit(-name=>"decline_rename_course", -value=>"Don't rename"),
01112                 "&nbsp;",
01113                 CGI::submit(-name=>"confirm_rename_course", -value=>"Rename") ,
01114             );
01115         } elsif(  $directories_ok  ) {
01116             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01117                 CGI::submit(-name => "decline_rename_course", -value => "Don't rename"),
01118                 "&nbsp;",
01119                 CGI::submit(-name=>"upgrade_course_tables", -value=>"upgrade course tables"),
01120             );
01121         } else  {
01122             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01123                 CGI::submit(-name => "decline_rename_course", -value => "Don't rename"),
01124                 CGI::br(),"Directory structure needs to be repaired manually before renaming."
01125             );
01126         } 
01127     }
01128 }
01129 sub rename_course_validate {
01130     my ($self) = @_;
01131     my $r = $self->r;
01132     my $ce = $r->ce;
01133     #my $db = $r->db;
01134     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01135     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01136     
01137     my $rename_oldCourseID     = $r->param("rename_oldCourseID")     || "";
01138     my $rename_newCourseID     = $r->param("rename_newCourseID")     || "";
01139     
01140     my @errors;
01141     
01142     if ($rename_oldCourseID eq "") {
01143         push @errors, "You must select a course to rename.";
01144     }
01145     if ($rename_newCourseID eq "") {
01146         push @errors, "You must specify a new name for the course.";
01147     }
01148     if ($rename_oldCourseID eq $rename_newCourseID) {
01149         push @errors, "Can't rename to the same name.";
01150     }
01151     unless ($rename_newCourseID =~ /^[\w-]*$/) { # regex copied from CourseAdministration.pm
01152         push @errors, "Course ID may only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.";
01153     }
01154     if (grep { $rename_newCourseID eq $_ } listCourses($ce)) {
01155         push @errors, "A course with ID $rename_newCourseID already exists.";
01156     }
01157     
01158     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01159         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01160         courseName => $rename_oldCourseID,
01161     });
01162     
01163     return @errors;
01164 }
01165 
01166 sub do_rename_course {
01167     my ($self) = @_;
01168     my $r = $self->r;
01169     my $ce = $r->ce;
01170     my $db = $r->db;
01171     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01172     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01173     
01174     my $rename_oldCourseID     = $r->param("rename_oldCourseID")     || "";
01175     my $rename_newCourseID     = $r->param("rename_newCourseID")     || "";
01176     
01177     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01178         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01179         courseName => $rename_oldCourseID,
01180     });
01181     
01182     my $dbLayoutName = $ce->{dbLayoutName};
01183     
01184     # this is kinda left over from when we had 'gdbm' and 'sql' database layouts
01185     # below this line, we would grab values from getopt and put them in this hash
01186     # but for now the hash can remain empty
01187     my %dbOptions;
01188     
01189     eval {
01190         renameCourse(
01191             courseID      => $rename_oldCourseID,
01192             ce            => $ce2,
01193             dbOptions     => \%dbOptions,
01194             newCourseID   => $rename_newCourseID,
01195         );
01196     };
01197     if ($@) {
01198         my $error = $@;
01199         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
01200             CGI::p("An error occured while renaming the course $rename_oldCourseID to $rename_newCourseID:"),
01201             CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
01202         );
01203     } else {
01204         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
01205             CGI::p("Successfully renamed the course $rename_oldCourseID to $rename_newCourseID"),
01206         );
01207          writeLog($ce, "hosted_courses", join("\t",
01208             "\tRenamed",
01209             "",
01210             "",
01211             "$rename_oldCourseID to $rename_newCourseID",
01212         ));     
01213         my $newCoursePath = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r,
01214             courseID => $rename_newCourseID);
01215         my $newCourseURL = $self->systemLink($newCoursePath, authen => 0);
01216         print CGI::div({style=>"text-align: center"},
01217             CGI::a({href=>$newCourseURL}, "Log into $rename_newCourseID"),
01218         );
01219     }
01220 }
01221 
01222 ################################################################################
01223 
01224 my %coursesData;    
01225 sub byLoginActivity {$coursesData{$a}{'epoch_modify_time'} <=> $coursesData{$b}{'epoch_modify_time'}}
01226 
01227 sub delete_course_form {
01228     my ($self) = @_;
01229     my $r = $self->r;
01230     my $ce = $r->ce;
01231     #my $db = $r->db;
01232     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01233     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01234     
01235     my $delete_courseID     = $r->param("delete_courseID")     || "";
01236     
01237     my $coursesDir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses};
01238     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
01239 #   @courseIDs    = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs; #make sort case insensitive 
01240     my $delete_listing_format   = $r->param("delete_listing_format"); 
01241     unless (defined $delete_listing_format) {$delete_listing_format = 'alphabetically';}  #use the default
01242     
01243 #   my %courseLabels; # records... heh.
01244 #   foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
01245 #       my $tempCE = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01246 #           %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01247 #           courseName => $courseID,
01248 #       });
01249 #       $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID (" . $tempCE->{dbLayoutName} . ")";
01250 #   }
01251     # Get and store last modify time for login.log for all courses. Also get visibility status.
01252     my %courseLabels;
01253     my @noLoginLogIDs = ();
01254     my @loginLogIDs = ();
01255 
01256     my ($loginLogFile, $epoch_modify_time, $courseDir);
01257     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
01258         $loginLogFile = "$coursesDir/$courseID/logs/login.log";
01259         if (-e $loginLogFile) {                 #this should always exist except for the model course
01260             $epoch_modify_time = stat($loginLogFile)->mtime;
01261             $coursesData{$courseID}{'epoch_modify_time'} = $epoch_modify_time;
01262             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = ctime($epoch_modify_time);
01263             push(@loginLogIDs,$courseID);
01264         } else {
01265             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = 'no login.log';  #this should never be the case except for the model course
01266             push(@noLoginLogIDs,$courseID);
01267         }
01268         if (-f "$coursesDir/$courseID/hide_directory") {
01269             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'hidden';
01270         } else {    
01271             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'visible';  
01272         }
01273         $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID  ($coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} :: $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'}) ";
01274     }
01275     if ($delete_listing_format eq 'last_login') {
01276         @noLoginLogIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @noLoginLogIDs; #this should be an empty arrey except for the model course
01277         @loginLogIDs = sort byLoginActivity @loginLogIDs;  # oldest first
01278         @courseIDs = (@noLoginLogIDs,@loginLogIDs);
01279     } else { # in this case we sort alphabetically
01280         @courseIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs;
01281     }
01282         
01283     print CGI::h2("Delete Course");
01284     
01285     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01286     my %list_labels = (
01287                                 alphabetically => 'alphabetically', 
01288                                 last_login => 'by last login date',
01289                                 );
01290     print CGI::p(
01291         'Courses are listed either alphabetically or in order by the time of most recent login activity, oldest first.
01292         To change the listing order check the mode you want and click "Refresh Listing".  The listing format is: Course_Name 
01293         (status :: date/time of most recent login) where status is "hidden" or "visible".');
01294 
01295     print CGI::table(
01296             CGI::Tr({},
01297             CGI::p("Select a listing format:"),
01298             CGI::radio_group(-name=>'delete_listing_format',
01299                                             -values=>['alphabetically', 'last_login'],
01300                                             -default=>'alphabetically',
01301                                             -labels=>\%list_labels,
01302                                             ),
01303             ),
01304         );  
01305     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"delete_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), 
01306       CGI::submit(-name=>"delete_course", -value=>"Delete Course"));    
01307     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01308     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01309     
01310 
01311     print CGI::p("Select a course to delete.");
01312     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
01313         CGI::Tr({},
01314             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course Name:"),
01315             CGI::td(
01316                 CGI::scrolling_list(
01317                     -name => "delete_courseID",
01318                     -values => \@courseIDs,
01319                     -default => $delete_courseID,
01320                     -size => 15,
01321                     -multiple => 0,
01322                     -labels => \%courseLabels,
01323                 ),
01324             ),
01325         ),
01326     );
01327     
01328     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"delete_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), 
01329       CGI::submit(-name=>"delete_course", -value=>"Delete Course"));    
01330     
01331     print CGI::end_form();
01332 }

01394 sub do_delete_course {
01395     my ($self) = @_;
01396     my $r = $self->r;
01397     my $ce = $r->ce;
01398     my $db = $r->db;
01399     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01400     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01401     
01402     my $delete_courseID     = $r->param("delete_courseID")     || "";
01403     
01404     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01405         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01406         courseName => $delete_courseID,
01407     });
01408     
01409     # this is kinda left over from when we had 'gdbm' and 'sql' database layouts
01410     # below this line, we would grab values from getopt and put them in this hash
01411     # but for now the hash can remain empty
01412     my %dbOptions;
01413     
01414     eval {
01415         deleteCourse(
01416             courseID => $delete_courseID,
01417             ce => $ce2,
01418             dbOptions => \%dbOptions,
01419         );
01420     };
01421     
01422     if ($@) {
01423         my $error = $@;
01424         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
01425             CGI::p("An error occured while deleting the course $delete_courseID:"),
01426             CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
01427         );
01428     } else {
01429         # mark the contact person in the admin course as dropped.
01430         # find the contact person for the course by searching the admin classlist.
01431         my @contacts = grep /_$delete_courseID$/,  $db->listUsers;
01432         if (@contacts) {
01433             die "Incorrect number of contacts for the course $delete_courseID". join(" ", @contacts) if @contacts !=1;
01434             #warn "contacts", join(" ", @contacts);
01435             #my $composite_id = "${add_initial_userID}_${add_courseID}";
01436             my $composite_id  = $contacts[0];
01437             
01438             # mark the contact person as dropped.
01439             my $User = $db->getUser($composite_id);
01440             my $status_name = 'Drop';
01441             my $status_value = ($ce->status_name_to_abbrevs($status_name))[0];
01442             $User->status($status_value);
01443             $db->putUser($User);
01444         }
01445         
01446         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
01447             CGI::p("Successfully deleted the course $delete_courseID."),
01448         );
01449          writeLog($ce, "hosted_courses", join("\t",
01450             "\tDeleted",
01451             "",
01452             "",
01453             $delete_courseID,
01454         ));
01455         print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01456         print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01457         print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01458         
01459         print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"decline_delete_course", -value=>"OK"),);
01460         
01461         print CGI::end_form();
01462     }
01463 }

01465 sub archive_course_form {
01466     my ($self) = @_;
01467     my $r = $self->r;
01468     my $ce = $r->ce;
01469     #my $db = $r->db;
01470     #my $authz = $r->authz;

01472

01474     
01475     my $coursesDir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses};
01476     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
01477 #   @courseIDs    = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs; #make sort case insensitive
01478     my $archive_listing_format   = $r->param("archive_listing_format"); 
01479     unless (defined $archive_listing_format) {$archive_listing_format = 'alphabetically';}  #use the default
01480     
01481 #   my %courseLabels; # records... heh.
01482 #   foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
01483 #       my $tempCE = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01484 #           %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01485 #           courseName => $courseID,
01486 #       });
01487 #       $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID (" . $tempCE->{dbLayoutName} . ")";
01488 #   }
01489     # Get and store last modify time for login.log for all courses. Also get visibility status.
01490     my %courseLabels;
01491     my @noLoginLogIDs = ();
01492     my @loginLogIDs = ();
01493 
01494     my ($loginLogFile, $epoch_modify_time, $courseDir);
01495     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
01496         $loginLogFile = "$coursesDir/$courseID/logs/login.log";
01497         if (-e $loginLogFile) {                 #this should always exist except for the model course
01498             $epoch_modify_time = stat($loginLogFile)->mtime;
01499             $coursesData{$courseID}{'epoch_modify_time'} = $epoch_modify_time;
01500             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = ctime($epoch_modify_time);
01501             push(@loginLogIDs,$courseID);
01502         } else {
01503             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = 'no login.log';  #this should never be the case except for the model course
01504             push(@noLoginLogIDs,$courseID);
01505         }
01506         if (-f "$coursesDir/$courseID/hide_directory") {
01507             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'hidden';
01508         } else {    
01509             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'visible';  
01510         }
01511         $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID  ($coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} :: $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'}) ";
01512     }
01513     if ($archive_listing_format eq 'last_login') {
01514         @noLoginLogIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @noLoginLogIDs; #this should be an empty arrey except for the model course
01515         @loginLogIDs = sort byLoginActivity @loginLogIDs;  # oldest first
01516         @courseIDs = (@noLoginLogIDs,@loginLogIDs);
01517     } else { # in this case we sort alphabetically
01518         @courseIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs;
01519     }
01520     
01521     print CGI::h2("archive Course");
01522     
01523     print CGI::p(
01524         'Creates a gzipped tar archive (.tar.gz) of a course in the WeBWorK
01525         courses directory. Before archiving, the course database is dumped into
01526         a subdirectory of the course\'s DATA directory. Currently the archive
01527         facility is only available for mysql databases. It depends on the
01528         mysqldump application.'
01529     );
01530         print CGI::p(
01531         'Courses are listed either alphabetically or in order by the time of most recent login activity, oldest first.
01532         To change the listing order check the mode you want and click "Refresh Listing".  The listing format is: Course_Name 
01533         (status :: date/time of most recent login) where status is "hidden" or "visible".');
01534 
01535     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01536     my %list_labels = (
01537                                 alphabetically => 'alphabetically', 
01538                                 last_login => 'by last login date', 
01539                                 );
01540                                             
01541     print CGI::table(
01542             CGI::Tr({},
01543             CGI::p("Select a listing format:"),
01544             CGI::radio_group(-name=>'archive_listing_format',
01545                                             -values=>['alphabetically', 'last_login'],
01546                                             -default=>'alphabetically',
01547                                             -labels=>\%list_labels,
01548                                             ),
01549             ),
01550         );  
01551     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"archive_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), 
01552       CGI::submit(-name=>"archive_course", -value=>"Archive Courses")); 
01553     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01554     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01555     
01556     print CGI::p("Select course(s) to archive.");
01557     
01558     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
01559         CGI::Tr({},
01560             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course Name:"),
01561             CGI::td(
01562                 CGI::scrolling_list(
01563                     -name => "archive_courseIDs",
01564                     -values => \@courseIDs,
01565                     -default => $archive_courseID,
01566                     -size => 15,
01567                     -multiple => 1,
01568                     -labels => \%courseLabels,
01569                 ),
01570             ),
01571             
01572         ),
01573         CGI::Tr({},
01574             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Delete course:"),
01575             CGI::td({-style=>'color:red'}, CGI::checkbox({ 
01576                                 -name=>'delete_course', 
01577                                 -checked=>0,
01578                                 -value => 1,
01579                                 -label =>'Delete course after archiving. Caution there is no undo!',
01580                                },
01581                    ),
01582             ),
01583         )
01584     );
01585     
01586     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"archive_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), 
01587     CGI::submit(-name=>"archive_course", -value=>"Archive Courses"));
01588     
01589     print CGI::end_form();
01590 }

01592 sub archive_course_validate {
01593     my ($self) = @_;
01594     my $r = $self->r;
01595     my $ce = $r->ce;
01596     #my $db = $r->db;

01599

01601     @archive_courseIDs        = () unless @archive_courseIDs;
01602     my @errors;
01603     foreach my $archive_courseID (@archive_courseIDs) {
01604         if ($archive_courseID eq "") {
01605             push @errors, "You must specify a course name.";
01606         } elsif ($archive_courseID eq $urlpath->arg("courseID")) {
01607             push @errors, "You cannot archive the course you are currently using.";
01608         }
01609     }
01610     
01611     #my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01612     #   %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01613     #   courseName => $archive_courseID,
01614     #});
