01619 sub archive_course_confirm {
01620     my ($self) = @_;
01621     my $r = $self->r;
01622     my $ce = $r->ce;
01623     #my $db = $r->db;
01624     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01625     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01626     
01627     print CGI::h2("archive Course");
01628     
01629     my $delete_course_flag   = $r->param("delete_course")        || "";
01630     
01631     my @archive_courseIDs     = $r->param("archive_courseIDs");
01632     @archive_courseIDs        = () unless @archive_courseIDs;
01633     my $archive_courseID  = $r->param("archive_courseID"); 
01634     $archive_courseID  = $archive_courseIDs[0] unless $archive_courseID;
01635     
01636     
01637     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01638         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01639         courseName => $archive_courseID,
01640     });
01641 
01642     
01643     my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus);
01644 #############################################################################
01645 # Check database
01646 #############################################################################
01647     my %missing_fields;
01648     if ($ce2->{dbLayoutName} ) {
01649         my $CIchecker = new WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck(ce=>$ce2);
01650         ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($archive_courseID);
01651         if ($r->param("upgrade_course_tables")) {
01652             my @schema_table_names = keys %$dbStatus;  # update tables missing from database;
01653             my @tables_to_create = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A} @schema_table_names;
01654             my @tables_to_alter  = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B} @schema_table_names;
01655             my $msg = $CIchecker->updateCourseTables($archive_courseID, [@tables_to_create]);
01656             foreach my $table_name (@tables_to_alter) {
01657                 $msg .= $CIchecker->updateTableFields($archive_courseID, $table_name);
01658             }
01659             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:green; font-weight:bold'}, $msg);
01660         }
01661         if ($r->param("upgrade_course_tables") ) {
01662             
01663             $CIchecker -> updateCourseDirectories();   # needs more error messages
01664         
01665         
01666         
01667         }
01668         ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($archive_courseID);
01669  
01670 
01671         # print db status
01672 
01673         my %msg =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in schema but missing in database"),
01674                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in database but missing in schema"),
01675                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," Table is ok "),
01676                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database table definitions do not agree "),
01677         );
01678         my %msg2 =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A        => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in database"),
01679                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in schema"),
01680                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," is ok "),
01681                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database field definitions do not agree "),
01682         );
01683         my $all_tables_ok=1;
01684         my $extra_database_tables=0;
01685         my $extra_database_fields=0;
01686         my $str=CGI::h4("Report on database structure for course $archive_courseID:").CGI::br();
01687         foreach my $table (sort keys %$dbStatus) {
01688             my $table_status = $dbStatus->{$table}->[0];
01689             $str .= CGI::b($table) .  $msg{ $table_status } . CGI::br();
01690             
01691             CASE: {
01692                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B 
01693                     && do{ last CASE;
01694                     };
01695                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A
01696                     && do{
01697                            $all_tables_ok = 0; last CASE;
01698                     };
01699                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B
01700                     && do{
01701                            $extra_database_tables = 1; last CASE;
01702                     };
01703                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B
01704                     && do{ 
01705                         my %fieldInfo = %{ $dbStatus->{$table}->[1] };
01706                         foreach my $key (keys %fieldInfo) {
01707                             my $field_status = $fieldInfo{$key}->[0];
01708                             CASE2: {
01709                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B 
01710                                     && do{ 
01711                                        $extra_database_fields = 1; last CASE2;
01712                                     };
01713                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A 
01714                                     && do{ 
01715                                        $all_tables_ok=0; last CASE2;
01716                                     };                          
01717                             }
01718                             $str .= CGI::br()."\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Field $key => ". $msg2{$field_status };
01719                         }                           
01720                     };
01721             }
01722             $str.=CGI::br();
01723             
01724         }
01725 #############################################################################
01726 # Report on databases
01727 #############################################################################
01728 
01729         print CGI::p($str);
01730         if ($extra_database_tables) {
01731                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database tables which are not defined in the schema.  
01732                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database.");
01733         } 
01734         if ($extra_database_fields) {
01735                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database fields  which are not defined in the schema for at least one table.  
01736                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database.");
01737         } 
01738         if ($all_tables_ok) {
01739             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:green; font-weight:bold'},"Course $archive_courseID database is in order");
01740             print(CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'}, "Are you sure that you want to delete the course ".
01741                   CGI::b($archive_courseID). " after archiving?  This cannot be undone!")) if $delete_course_flag;
01742         } else {
01743             print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'}, "There are tables or fields missing from the
01744                     database.  The database  
01745                     must be upgraded before archiving this course."
01746             );
01747         }
01748 #############################################################################
01749 # Check directories and report
01750 #############################################################################
01751 
01752 
01753       my ($directories_ok, $str2) = $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories();
01754       my $style = ($directories_ok)?"color:green" : "color:red";
01755       print CGI::h2("Directory structure"), CGI::p($str2),
01756       ($directories_ok)? CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is ok") :
01757               CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is missing directories 
01758                           or the webserver lacks sufficient privileges.");
01759     
01760 
01761 
01762 
01763 #############################################################################
01764 # Print form for choosing next action.
01765 #############################################################################
01766 
01767         print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01768         print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01769         print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01770         print $self->hidden_fields(qw/delete_course/);
01771         print CGI::hidden('archive_courseID', $archive_courseID);
01772         print CGI::hidden('archive_courseIDs',@archive_courseIDs);
01773             # grab some values we'll need
01774         my $course_dir   = $ce2->{courseDirs}{root};
01775         my $archive_path = $ce2->{webworkDirs}{courses} . "/$archive_courseID.tar.gz";
01776         # fail if the source course does not exist
01777         unless (-e $course_dir) {
01778             print CGI::p( "$archive_courseID: The directory for the course not found.");
01779         }
01780         
01781         if ($all_tables_ok && $directories_ok ) { # no missing fields
01782             # Warn about overwriting an existing archive
01783             if (-e $archive_path and -w $archive_path) {
01784                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"The course '$archive_courseID' has already been archived at '$archive_path'.
01785                   This earlier archive will be erased.  This cannot be undone.");
01786             }
01787             # archive execute button
01788             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01789                 CGI::submit(-name=>"decline_archive_course", -value=>"Stop archiving"),
01790                 "&nbsp;",
01791                 (@archive_courseIDs)? CGI::submit(-name=>"archive_course", -value=>"Skip archiving this course")."&nbsp;":'',
01792                 CGI::submit(-name=>"confirm_archive_course", -value=>"archive") ,
01793             );
01794         } elsif( $directories_ok)  {
01795             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01796             CGI::submit(-name => "decline_archive_course", -value => "Don't archive"),
01797                 "&nbsp;",
01798                 CGI::submit(-name=>"upgrade_course_tables", -value=>"upgrade course tables"),
01799             );
01800         } else {
01801             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
01802             CGI::br(),
01803             "Directory structure needs to be repaired manually before archiving.",CGI::br(),
01804             CGI::submit(-name => "decline_archive_course", -value => "Don't archive"),
01805             CGI::submit(-name => "upgrade_course_tables", -value => "Attempt to upgrade directories"),
01806             );
01807         
01808         }
01809         print CGI::end_form();
01810     } else {
01811         print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"Unable to find database layout for $archive_courseID");
01812     }
01813 }
01814 
01815 sub do_archive_course {
01816     my ($self) = @_;
01817     my $r = $self->r;
01818     my $ce = $r->ce;
01819     my $db = $r->db;
01820     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01821     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01822     
01823     
01824     my $archive_courseID     = $r->param("archive_courseID")     || "";
01825     my $delete_course_flag   = $r->param("delete_course")        || "";
01826     my @archive_courseIDs     = $r->param("archive_courseIDs");
01827     @archive_courseIDs        = () unless @archive_courseIDs;
01828 
01829     my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
01830         %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
01831         courseName => $archive_courseID,
01832     });
01833     
01834     # Remove course specific temp files before archiving
01835     my $courseTempDir = $ce2->{courseDirs}{html_temp};
01836     remove_tree("$courseTempDir");
01837     # Remove the original default tmp directory if it exists 
01838     my $orgDefaultCourseTempDir = "$ce2->{courseDirs}{html}/tmp";   
01839     if (-d "$orgDefaultCourseTempDir") {
01840         remove_tree("$orgDefaultCourseTempDir");
01841     }
01842 
01843     # this is kinda left over from when we had 'gdbm' and 'sql' database layouts
01844     # below this line, we would grab values from getopt and put them in this hash
01845     # but for now the hash can remain empty
01846     my %dbOptions;
01847     
01848     eval {
01849         archiveCourse(
01850             courseID => $archive_courseID,
01851             ce => $ce2,
01852             dbOptions => \%dbOptions,
01853         );
01854     };
01855     
01856     if ($@) {
01857         my $error = $@;
01858         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
01859             CGI::p("An error occured while archiving the course $archive_courseID:"),
01860             CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
01861         );
01862     } else {
01863         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
01864             CGI::p("Successfully archived the course $archive_courseID"),
01865         );
01866          writeLog($ce, "hosted_courses", join("\t",
01867             "\tarchived",
01868             "",
01869             "",
01870             $archive_courseID,
01871         ));
01872         
01873         if ($delete_course_flag) {
01874             eval {
01875                 deleteCourse(
01876                     courseID => $archive_courseID,
01877                     ce => $ce2,
01878                     dbOptions => \%dbOptions,
01879                 );
01880             };
01881             
01882             if ($@) {
01883                 my $error = $@;
01884                 print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
01885                     CGI::p("An error occured while deleting the course $archive_courseID:"),
01886                     CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
01887                 );
01888             } else {
01889                 # mark the contact person in the admin course as dropped.
01890                 # find the contact person for the course by searching the admin classlist.
01891                 my @contacts = grep /_$archive_courseID$/,  $db->listUsers;
01892                 if (@contacts) {
01893                     die "Incorrect number of contacts for the course $archive_courseID". join(" ", @contacts) if @contacts !=1;
01894                     #warn "contacts", join(" ", @contacts);
01895                     #my $composite_id = "${add_initial_userID}_${add_courseID}";
01896                     my $composite_id  = $contacts[0];
01897                     
01898                     # mark the contact person as dropped.
01899                     my $User = $db->getUser($composite_id);
01900                     my $status_name = 'Drop';
01901                     my $status_value = ($ce->status_name_to_abbrevs($status_name))[0];
01902                     $User->status($status_value);
01903                     $db->putUser($User);
01904                 }
01905                 
01906                 print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
01907                     CGI::p("Successfully deleted the course $archive_courseID."),
01908                 );
01909             }
01910         
01911         
01912         }
01913         shift @archive_courseIDs;  # remove the course which has just been archived.
01914         if (@archive_courseIDs) {       
01915             print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01916             print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01917             print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01918             print $self->hidden_fields(qw/delete_course/);
01919 
01920             print CGI::hidden('archive_courseIDs',@archive_courseIDs);      
01921             print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit("decline_archive_course", "Stop archiving courses"),
01922                 CGI::submit("archive_course", "archive next course")
01923             );
01924             print CGI::end_form();
01925         } else {
01926             print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01927             print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01928             print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01929             print CGI::hidden("archive_courseID",$archive_courseID);
01930             print CGI::p( CGI::submit("decline_archive_course", "OK")  );
01931             print CGI::end_form();
01932         }
01933     }
01934 }

01938 sub unarchive_course_form {
01939     my ($self) = @_;
01940     my $r = $self->r;
01941     my $ce = $r->ce;
01942     #my $db = $r->db;
01943     #my $authz = $r->authz;
01944     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01945     
01946     my $unarchive_courseID     = $r->param("unarchive_courseID")     || "";
01947     
01948     # First find courses which have been archived.
01949     my @courseIDs = listArchivedCourses($ce);
01950     @courseIDs    = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs; #make sort case insensitive 
01951     
01952     my %courseLabels; # records... heh.
01953     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
01954         $courseLabels{$courseID} = $courseID;
01955     }
01956     
01957     print CGI::h2("Unarchive Course");
01958     
01959     print CGI::p(
01960         "Restores a course from a gzipped tar archive (.tar.gz). After
01961         unarchiving, the course database is restored from a subdirectory of the
01962         course's DATA directory. Currently the archive facility is only
01963         available for mysql databases. It depends on the mysqldump application."
01964     );
01965     
01966     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
01967     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
01968     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
01969     
01970     print CGI::p("Select a course to unarchive.");
01971     
01972     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
01973         CGI::Tr({},
01974             CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, "Course Name:"),
01975             CGI::td(
01976                 CGI::scrolling_list(
01977                     -name => "unarchive_courseID",
01978                     -values => \@courseIDs,
01979                     -default => $unarchive_courseID,
01980                     -size => 10,
01981                     -multiple => 0,
01982                     -labels => \%courseLabels,
01983                 ),
01984             ),
01985         ),
01986     
01987         CGI::Tr({},
01988                 CGI::th({class=>"LeftHeader"}, CGI::checkbox(-name => "create_newCourseID",-default=>'',-value=>1, -label=>'New Name:')),
01989                 CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"new_courseID", -value=>'', -size=>25)),
01990             ),
01991     );
01992     
01993     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"unarchive_course", -value=>"Unarchive Course"));
01994     
01995     print CGI::end_form();
01996 }
01997 
01998 sub unarchive_course_validate {
01999     my ($self) = @_;
02000     my $r = $self->r;
02001     my $ce = $r->ce;
02002     #my $db = $r->db;
02003     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02004     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02005     
02006     my $unarchive_courseID                   = $r->param("unarchive_courseID")             || "";
02007     my $create_newCourseID                   = $r->param("create_newCourseID")      || "";
02008     my $new_courseID                         = $r->param("new_courseID")    || "";
02009     my @errors;
02010     #by default we use the archive name for the course
02011     my $courseID = $unarchive_courseID; 
02012     $courseID =~ s/\.tar\.gz$//;
02013     
02014     if ( $create_newCourseID) {
02015         $courseID = $new_courseID;
02016     }
02017     debug(" unarchive_courseID $unarchive_courseID new_courseID $new_courseID ");
02018 
02019     if ($courseID eq "") {
02020         push @errors, "You must specify a course name.";
02021     } elsif ( -d $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses}."/$courseID" ) {
02022         #Check that a directory for this course doesn't already exist
02023         push @errors, "A directory already exists with the name $courseID. 
02024          You must first delete this existing course before you can unarchive.";
02025     }
02026 
02027     
02028     return @errors;
02029 }
02030 
02031 sub unarchive_course_confirm {
02032     my ($self) = @_;
02033     my $r = $self->r;
02034     my $ce = $r->ce;
02035     #my $db = $r->db;
02036     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02037     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02038     
02039     print CGI::h2("Unarchive Course");
02040     
02041     my $unarchive_courseID                    = $r->param("unarchive_courseID")     || "";
02042     my $create_newCourseID                    = $r->param("create_newCourseID")     || "";
02043     my $new_courseID                          = $r->param("new_courseID")           || "";
02044 
02045     my $courseID = $unarchive_courseID; $courseID =~ s/\.tar\.gz$//;
02046     
02047     if ( $create_newCourseID) {
02048         $courseID = $new_courseID;
02049     }   
02050 
02051     debug(" unarchive_courseID $unarchive_courseID new_courseID $new_courseID ");
02052 
02053     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
02054         print CGI::p($unarchive_courseID," to course ", 
02055                  CGI::input({-name=>'new_courseID', -value=>$courseID})
02056     );
02057 
02058     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02059     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02060     print $self->hidden_fields(qw/unarchive_courseID create_newCourseID/);
02061     
02062     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
02063         CGI::submit(-name=>"decline_unarchive_course", -value=>"Don't unarchive"),
02064         "&nbsp;",
02065         CGI::submit(-name=>"confirm_unarchive_course", -value=>"unarchive"),
02066     );
02067     
02068     print CGI::end_form();
02069 }

02071 sub do_unarchive_course {
02072     my ($self) = @_;
02073     my $r = $self->r;
02074     my $ce = $r->ce;
02075     #my $db = $r->db;
02076     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02077     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02078     my $new_courseID           = $r->param("new_courseID")           || "";
02079     my $unarchive_courseID     = $r->param("unarchive_courseID")     || "";
02080     
02081     my $old_courseID   = $unarchive_courseID; 
02082     $old_courseID =~ s/.tar.gz//;
02083 
02084     #eval {
02085         unarchiveCourse(
02086             newCourseID => $new_courseID,
02087             oldCourseID => $old_courseID,
02088             archivePath =>$ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses}."/$unarchive_courseID",
02089             ce => $ce,
02090         );
02091     #};
02092     
02093     if ($@) {
02094         my $error = $@;
02095         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02096             CGI::p("An error occured while archiving the course $unarchive_courseID:"),
02097             CGI::tt(CGI::escapeHTML($error)),
02098         );
02099     } else {
02100         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
02101             CGI::p("Successfully unarchived  $unarchive_courseID to the course $new_courseID"),
02102         );
02103          writeLog($ce, "hosted_courses", join("\t",
02104             "\tunarchived",
02105             "",
02106             "",
02107             "$unarchive_courseID to $new_courseID",
02108         ));
02109 
02110         my $newCoursePath = $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r,
02111             courseID => $new_courseID);
02112         my $newCourseURL = $self->systemLink($newCoursePath, authen => 0);
02113         print CGI::div({style=>"text-align: center"},
02114             CGI::a({href=>$newCourseURL}, "Log into $new_courseID"),
02115         );
02116         
02117         print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
02118         print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02119         print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02120         print CGI::hidden("unarchive_courseID",$unarchive_courseID);
02121         print CGI::p( CGI::submit("decline_unarchive_course", "unarchive next course")  );
02122         print CGI::end_form();
02123  
02124     }
02125 }

02129 sub upgrade_course_form {
02130     my ($self) = @_;
02131     my $r = $self->r;
02132     my $ce = $r->ce;
02133     #my $db = $r->db;
02134     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02135     #my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02136     
02137     
02138     my $selectAll =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_all', -value=>'Select all eligible courses',
02139            onClick => "for (i in document.courselist.elements)  { 
02140                            if (document.courselist.elements[i].name =='upgrade_courseIDs') { 
02141                                document.courselist.elements[i].checked = true
02142                            }
02143                         }" });
02144     my $selectNone =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_none', -value=>'Unselect all courses',
02145            onClick => "for (i in document.courselist.elements)  { 
02146                            if (document.courselist.elements[i].name =='upgrade_courseIDs') { 
02147                               document.courselist.elements[i].checked = false
02148                            }
02149                         }" });
02150 
02151     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
02152     @courseIDs    = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs; #make sort case insensitive 
02153     
02154     print CGI::h2("Upgrade Courses");
02155     
02156     print CGI::p(
02157         "Update the checked directories?"
02158     );
02159     
02160     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri, -id=>"courselist", -name=>"courselist"),
02161           CGI::p($selectAll, $selectNone);
02162     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02163     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02164     
02165         foreach my $courseID ( @courseIDs) {
02166             next if $courseID eq "admin"; # done already above
02167             next if $courseID eq "modelCourse"; # modelCourse isn't a real course so don't create missing directories, etc
02168             next unless $courseID =~/\S/;  # skip empty courseIDs (there shouldn't be any
02169             my $urlpath = $r->urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemSets", $r, courseID => $courseID);
02170             my $tempCE;
02171             eval{ $tempCE = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
02172                 %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
02173                 courseName => $courseID,
02174             })};
02175             print "Can't create course environment for $courseID because $@" if $@;
02176             my $CIchecker = new WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck(ce=>$tempCE);
02177             $CIchecker->updateCourseDirectories();  #creates missing html_temp, mailmerge tmpEditFileDir directories;
02178             my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus)   = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($courseID);
02179             my ($directories_ok, $str2) = $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories();
02180             my $checked = ($tables_ok && $directories_ok)?0:1;   # don't check if everything is ok
02181             my $checkbox_spot = "";
02182             if ($checked) {  # only show checkbox if the course is not up-to-date
02183                 $checkbox_spot = CGI::checkbox({name=>"upgrade_courseIDs", label=>'upgrade', selected=>$checked,value=>$courseID});
02184             }
02185             print CGI::li(
02186                 $checkbox_spot,"&nbsp;",
02187                 CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath, authen => 0)}, $courseID),
02188                 CGI::code(
02189                     $tempCE->{dbLayoutName},
02190                 ),
02191                 $directories_ok ? "" : CGI::span({style=>"color:red"},"Directory structure or permissions need to be repaired. "),
02192                 $tables_ok ? CGI::span({style=>"color:green"},"Database tables ok") : CGI::span({style=>"color:red"},"Database tables need updating."),
02193             
02194             );
02195              
02196         }
02197         
02198 
02199     
02200     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"upgrade_course", -value=>"Upgrade Courses"));
02201     
02202     print CGI::end_form();
02203 }

02205 sub upgrade_course_validate {
02206     my ($self) = @_;
02207     my $r = $self->r;
02208     my $ce = $r->ce;
02209     #my $db = $r->db;
02210     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02211     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02212     
02213     my @upgrade_courseIDs     = $r->param("upgrade_courseIDs") ; 
02214     @upgrade_courseIDs        = () unless  @upgrade_courseIDs;
02215     #warn "validate: upgrade ids ", join("|",@upgrade_courseIDs);
02216     my @errors;
02217     foreach my $upgrade_courseID (@upgrade_courseIDs) {
02218         if ($upgrade_courseID eq "") {
02219             push @errors, "You must specify a course name.";
02220         } 
02221     }
02222     
02223     
02224     return @errors;
02225 }

02227 sub upgrade_course_confirm {
02228     my ($self) = @_;
02229     my $r = $self->r;
02230     my $ce = $r->ce;
02231     my $db = $r->db;
02232     
02233     
02234     my @upgrade_courseIDs     = $r->param("upgrade_courseIDs");
02235     @upgrade_courseIDs        = () unless @upgrade_courseIDs;
02236     #my $upgrade_courseID      = $upgrade_courseIDs[0];
02237     my %update_error_msg      = ();
02238     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
02239     foreach my $upgrade_courseID (@upgrade_courseIDs) {
02240         next unless $upgrade_courseID =~/\S/;   # skip empty values
02241         ##########################
02242         # analyze one course
02243         ##########################
02244         my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
02245             %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
02246             courseName => $upgrade_courseID,
02247         });
02248         #warn "upgrade_course_confirm: updating |$upgrade_courseID| from course list: " , join("|",@upgrade_courseIDs); 
02249     
02250         #############################################################################
02251         # Create integrity checker
02252         #############################################################################
02253     
02254         my $CIchecker = new WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck(ce=>$ce2);
02255     
02256         #############################################################################
02257         # Report on database status
02258         #############################################################################
02259     
02260         my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($upgrade_courseID);
02261         my ($all_tables_ok, $extra_database_tables, $extra_database_fields, $str) = formatReportOnDatabaseTables($tables_ok, $dbStatus);
02262         # prepend course name
02263         $str = CGI::checkbox({name=>"upgrade_courseIDs", label=>'upgrade', selected=>1,value=>$upgrade_courseID}).
02264                  "Report for course $upgrade_courseID:".CGI::br()."Database:".CGI::br(). $str;
02265          
02266         #############################################################################
02267         # Report on databases
02268         #############################################################################
02269     
02270         print CGI::p($str);
02271         if ($extra_database_tables) {
02272                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database tables which are not defined in the schema.  
02273                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database.");
02274         } 
02275         if ($extra_database_fields) {
02276                 print CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database fields  which are not defined in the schema for at least one table.  
02277                                                                      They can only be removed manually from the database.");
02278         } 
02279     
02280        
02281         #############################################################################
02282         # Report on directory status
02283         #############################################################################
02284         my ($directories_ok, $str2) = $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories();
02285         my $style = ($directories_ok)?"color:green" : "color:red";
02286         print "Directory structure".CGI::br(), CGI::p($str2),
02287         ($directories_ok)? CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is ok") :
02288               CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is missing directories 
02289                           or the webserver lacks sufficient privileges.");
02290     }
02291     #warn "upgrade_course_confirm:  now print form";
02292     #############################################################################
02293     # Print form for choosing next action.
02294     #############################################################################
02295     print CGI::h3("No course id defined") unless @upgrade_courseIDs;
02296 
02297 
02298     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02299     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02300     #print CGI::hidden('upgrade_courseIDs',@upgrade_courseIDs);
02301 
02302     ####################################################################
02303     # Submit buttons
02304     # After presenting a detailed summary of status of selected courses the choice is made to
02305     # upgrade the selected courses (confirm_upgrade_course is set
02306     # or return to the beginning (decline_upgrade_course   is set           
02307     
02308     ####################################################################
02309     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"},
02310         CGI::submit(-name =>"decline_upgrade_course", -value => "Don't upgrade"),
02311         CGI::submit(-name=>"confirm_upgrade_course", -value=>"Upgrade") );
02312         
02313     print   CGI::h3("upgrade_course_confirm subroutine");
02314 
02315     print CGI::end_form();
02316 
02317 }
02318 
02319 sub do_upgrade_course {
02320     my ($self) = @_;
02321     my $r = $self->r;
02322     my $ce = $r->ce;
02323     my $db = $r->db;
02324     
02325     
02326     my @upgrade_courseIDs     = $r->param("upgrade_courseIDs");
02327     @upgrade_courseIDs        = () unless @upgrade_courseIDs;
02328     my %update_error_msg                  = ();
02329     #warn "do_upgrade_course:  upgrade_courseIDs = ", join(" ", @upgrade_courseIDs);
02330     foreach my $upgrade_courseID (@upgrade_courseIDs) {
02331         next unless $upgrade_courseID =~ /\S/; # omit blank course IDs
02332  
02333         ##########################
02334         # update one course
02335         ##########################
02336         my $ce2 = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
02337             %WeBWorK::SeedCE,
02338             courseName => $upgrade_courseID,
02339         });
02340         #warn "do_upgrade_course: updating |$upgrade_courseID| from" , join("|",@upgrade_courseIDs); 
02341         #############################################################################
02342         # Create integrity checker
02343         #############################################################################
02344     
02345         my $CIchecker = new WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck(ce=>$ce2);
02346         
02347         #############################################################################
02348         # Add missing tables and missing fields to existing tables
02349         #############################################################################
02350     
02351         my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($upgrade_courseID);
02352         my @schema_table_names = keys %$dbStatus;  # update tables missing from database;
02353         my @tables_to_create = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A} @schema_table_names;  
02354         my @tables_to_alter  = grep {$dbStatus->{$_}->[0] == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B} @schema_table_names;
02355         $update_error_msg{$upgrade_courseID} = $CIchecker->updateCourseTables($upgrade_courseID, [@tables_to_create]);
02356         foreach my $table_name (@tables_to_alter) { #warn "do_upgrade_course: adding new fields to table $table_name in course $upgrade_courseID";
02357             $update_error_msg{$upgrade_courseID} .= $CIchecker->updateTableFields($upgrade_courseID, $table_name);
02358         }
02359         ### $update_error_msg{$upgrade_courseID} is printed below
02360         #############################################################################
02361         # Add missing directories when it can be done safely
02362         #############################################################################   #warn "do_upgrade_course: updating course directories for $upgrade_courseID";
02363         $CIchecker -> updateCourseDirectories();   # needs more error messages
02364     
02365         
02366         #############################################################################
02367         # Analyze database status and prepare status report
02368         #############################################################################
02369     
02370         ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) = $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($upgrade_courseID);
02371           
02372         my ($all_tables_ok, $extra_database_tables, $extra_database_fields, $str) 
02373               = formatReportOnDatabaseTables($tables_ok, $dbStatus);
02374         # prepend course name
02375         $str = CGI::br()."Database:".CGI::br(). $str;
02376 
02377         #############################################################################
02378         # Report on databases and report summary
02379         #############################################################################
02380     
02381             
02382             if ($extra_database_tables) {
02383                     $str .= CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database tables which are not defined in the schema.  
02384                                                                          They can only be removed manually from the database.");
02385             } 
02386             if ($extra_database_fields) {
02387                     $str .= CGI::p({-style=>'color:red; font-weight:bold'},"There are extra database fields  which are not defined in the schema for at least one table.  
02388                                                                          They can only be removed manually from the database.");
02389             } 
02390        
02391         #############################################################################
02392         # Prepare report on directory status
02393         #############################################################################
02394           my ($directories_ok, $str2) = $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories();
02395           my $style = ($directories_ok)?"color:green" : "color:red";
02396           my $dir_msg  = join ('', 
02397             "Directory structure",CGI::br(), 
02398             CGI::p($str2),
02399             ($directories_ok)? CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is ok") :
02400                   CGI::p({style=>$style},"Directory structure is missing directories 
02401                               or the webserver lacks sufficient privileges.")
02402           );
02403     
02404         #############################################################################
02405         # Print status
02406         #############################################################################
02407         print " Report for course $upgrade_courseID:".CGI::br();
02408         print CGI::p({-style=>'color:green; font-weight:bold'}, $update_error_msg{$upgrade_courseID});
02409 
02410         print CGI::p($str);     # print message about tables
02411         print CGI::p($dir_msg); # message about directories
02412 
02413     }
02414     #############################################################################
02415     # Submit buttons -- return to beginning
02416     #############################################################################
02417     print CGI::h3("do_upgrade_course subroutine");
02418     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);  #send back to this script
02419     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02420     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02421     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"decline_upgrade_course", -value=>"Continue") );
02422     print CGI::end_form();
02423 }
02424     
02425

02431 sub manage_location_form {
02432     my ($self) = @_;
02433     my $r = $self->r;
02434     my $ce = $r->ce;
02435     my $db = $r->db;
02436     #my $authz = $r->authz;
02437     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
02438 
02439     # get a list of all existing locations
02440     my @locations = sort {lc($a->location_id) cmp lc($b->location_id)}
02441         $db->getAllLocations();
02442     my %locAddr = map {$_->location_id => [ $db->listLocationAddresses($_->location_id) ]} @locations;
02443 
02444     my @locationIDs = map { $_->location_id } @locations;
02445     
02446     print CGI::h2("Manage Locations");
02447 
02448     print CGI::p({},CGI::strong("Currently defined locations are listed below."));
02449 
02450     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
02451     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02452     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02453 
02454     # get a list of radio buttons to select an action
02455     my @actionRadios = 
02456         CGI::radio_group(-name => "manage_location_action",
02457                  -values => ["edit_location_form",
02458                          "add_location_handler",
02459                          "delete_location_handler"],
02460                  -labels => { edit_location_form => "",
02461                           add_location_handler => "",
02462                           delete_location_handler => "", },
02463                  -default => $r->param("manage_location_action") ? $r->param("manage_location_action") : 'none');
02464 
02465     print CGI::start_table({});
02466     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::th({-colspan=>4,-align=>"left"}, 
02467                   "Select an action to perform:"));
02468 
02469     # edit action
02470     print CGI::Tr({}, 
02471         CGI::td({},[ $actionRadios[0], "Edit Location:" ]),
02472         CGI::td({-colspan=>2, -align=>"left"}, 
02473             CGI::div({-style=>"width:25%;"},
02474                   CGI::popup_menu(-name=>"edit_location",
02475                     -values=>[@locationIDs]))) );
02476     # create action
02477     print CGI::Tr({},
02478         CGI::td({-align=>"left"},[ $actionRadios[1], 
02479             "Create Location:" ]),
02480         CGI::td({-colspan=>2},
02481             "Location name: " .
02482             CGI::textfield(-name=>"new_location_name",
02483                        -size=>"10",
02484                        -default=>$r->param("new_location_name")?$r->param("new_location_name"):'')));
02485     print CGI::Tr({valign=>'top'},
02486         CGI::td({}, ["&nbsp;", "Location description:"]),
02487         CGI::td({-colspan=>2}, 
02488             CGI::textfield(-name=>"new_location_description",
02489                        -size=>"50",
02490                        -default=>$r->param("new_location_description")?$r->param("new_location_description"):'')) );
02491     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({},"&nbsp;"),
02492         CGI::td({-colspan=>3}, "Addresses for new location " .
02493             "(enter one per line, as single IP addresses " .
02494             "(e.g., 192.168.1.101), address masks (e.g., " .
02495             "192.168.1.0/24), or IP ranges (e.g., " .
02496             "192.168.1.101-192.168.1.150)):"));
02497     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, "&nbsp;"),
02498         CGI::td({-colspan=>3},
02499             CGI::textarea({-name=>"new_location_addresses",
02500                        -rows=>5, -columns=>28,
02501                        -default=>$r->param("new_location_addresses")?$r->param("new_location_addresses"):''})));
02502 
02503     # delete action
02504     print CGI::Tr({}, 
02505         CGI::td({-colspan=>4}, 
02506             CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02507                  CGI::em({}, "Deletion deletes all location " .
02508                      "data and related addresses, and is" .
02509 
02510                      " not undoable!"))));
02511     print CGI::Tr({}, 
02512         CGI::td({}, 
02513             [ $actionRadios[2],
02514               CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02515                    "Delete location:") ]),
02516         CGI::td({-colspan=>2}, 
02517             CGI::popup_menu(-name=>"delete_location",
02518                     -values=>["",
02519                           "selected_locations",
02520                           @locationIDs],
02521                     -labels=>{selected_locations => "locations selected below",
02522                           "" => "no location"}) .
02523             CGI::span({-style=>"color:#C33;"}, "  Confirm: ") . 
02524             CGI::checkbox({-name=>"delete_confirm",
02525                        -value=>"true",
02526                        -label=>""}) ) );
02527     print CGI::end_table();
02528 
02529     print CGI::p({}, CGI::submit(-name=>"manage_locations", -value=>"Take Action!"));
02530 
02531     # existing location table
02532     # FIXME: the styles for this table should be off in a stylesheet 
02533     #    somewhere
02534     print CGI::start_div({align=>"center"}),
02535         CGI::start_table({border=>1, cellpadding=>2});
02536     print CGI::Tr({style=>"background-color:#e0e0e0;font-size:92%", align=>"left"}, 
02537               CGI::th({}, ["Select", "Location", "Description", 
02538                    "Addresses"]));
02539     foreach my $loc ( @locations ) {
02540         my $editAddr = $self->systemLink($urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"manage_locations", manage_location_action=>"edit_location_form", edit_location=>$loc->location_id});
02541         print CGI::Tr({valign=>'top',style=>"background-color:#eeeeee;"}, 
02542                   CGI::td({style=>'font-size:85%;'},
02543                       [ CGI::checkbox(-name=>"delete_selected",
02544                               -value=>$loc->location_id,
02545                               -label=>''),
02546                     CGI::a({href=>$editAddr}, $loc->location_id),
02547                     $loc->description,
02548                     join(', ', @{$locAddr{$loc->location_id}}) ]));
02549     }
02550     print CGI::end_table(), CGI::end_div();
02551     print CGI::end_form();
02552 
02553 
02554 }
02555 
02556 sub add_location_handler {
02557     my $self = shift();
02558     my $r = $self->r;
02559     my $db = $r->db;
02560 
02561     # the location data we're to add
02562     my $locationID = $r->param("new_location_name");
02563     my $locationDescr = $r->param("new_location_description");
02564     my $locationAddr = $r->param("new_location_addresses");
02565     # break the addresses up
02566     $locationAddr =~ s/\s*-\s*/-/g;
02567     $locationAddr =~ s/\s*\/\s*/\//g;
02568     my @addresses = split(/\s+/, $locationAddr);
02569 
02570     # sanity checks
02571     my $badAddr = '';
02572     foreach my $addr ( @addresses ) {
02573         unless ( new Net::IP($addr) ) {
02574             $badAddr .= "$addr, ";
02575             $locationAddr =~ s/$addr\n//s;
02576         }
02577     }
02578     $badAddr =~ s/, $//;
02579 
02580     # a check to be sure that the location addresses don't already
02581     #    exist
02582     my $badLocAddr;
02583     if ( ! $badAddr && $locationID ) {
02584         if ( $db->countLocationAddresses( $locationID ) ) {
02585             my @allLocAddr = $db->listLocationAddresses($locationID);
02586             foreach my $addr ( @addresses ) {
02587                 $badLocAddr .= "$addr, " 
02588                     if ( grep {/^$addr$/} @allLocAddr );
02589             }
02590             $badLocAddr =~ s/, $//;
02591         }
02592     }
02593 
02594     if ( ! @addresses || ! $locationID || ! $locationDescr ) {
02595         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02596                    "Missing required input data. Please check " .
02597                    "that you have filled in all of the create " .
02598                    "location fields and resubmit.");
02599     } elsif ( $badAddr ) {
02600         $r->param("new_location_addresses", $locationAddr);
02601         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02602                    "Address(es) $badAddr is(are) not in a " .
02603                    "recognized form.  Please check your " .
02604                    "data entry and resubmit.");
02605     } elsif ( $db->existsLocation( $locationID ) ) {
02606         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02607                    "A location with the name $locationID " .
02608                    "already exists in the database.  Did " .
02609                    "you mean to edit that location instead?");
02610     } elsif ( $badLocAddr ) {
02611         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02612                    "Address(es) $badLocAddr already exist " .
02613                    "in the database.  THIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN!  " .
02614                    "Please double check the integrity of " .
02615                    "the WeBWorK database before continuing.");
02616     } else {
02617         # add the location
02618         my $locationObj = $db->newLocation;
02619         $locationObj->location_id( $locationID );
02620         $locationObj->description( $locationDescr );
02621         $db->addLocation( $locationObj );
02622 
02623         # and add the addresses
02624         foreach my $addr ( @addresses ) {
02625             my $locationAddress = $db->newLocationAddress;
02626             $locationAddress->location_id($locationID);
02627             $locationAddress->ip_mask($addr);
02628 
02629             $db->addLocationAddress( $locationAddress );
02630         }
02631         
02632         # we've added the location, so clear those param 
02633         #    entries
02634         $r->param('manage_location_action','none');
02635         $r->param('new_location_name','');
02636         $r->param('new_location_description','');
02637         $r->param('new_location_addresses','');
02638 
02639         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithoutError"}, 
02640                    "Location $locationID has been created, " .
02641                    "with addresses " . join(', ', @addresses) .
02642                    ".");
02643     }
02644 
02645     $self->manage_location_form;
02646 }
02647 
02648 sub delete_location_handler {
02649     my $self = shift;
02650     my $r = $self->r;
02651     my $db = $r->db;
02652 
02653     # what location are we deleting?
02654     my $locationID = $r->param("delete_location");
02655     # check for selected deletions if appropriate
02656     my @delLocations = ( $locationID );
02657     if ( $locationID eq 'selected_locations' ) {
02658         @delLocations = $r->param("delete_selected");
02659         $locationID = @delLocations;
02660     }
02661     # are we sure?
02662     my $confirm = $r->param("delete_confirm");
02663 
02664     my $badID;
02665     if ( ! $locationID ) {
02666         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02667                    "Please provide a location name " . 
02668                    "to delete.");
02669 
02670     } elsif ( $badID = $self->existsLocations_helper( @delLocations ) ) {
02671         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02672                    "No location with name $badID " . 
02673                    "exists in the database.");
02674 
02675     } elsif ( ! $confirm || $confirm ne 'true' ) {
02676         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, 
02677                    "Location deletion requires confirmation.");
02678     } else {
02679         foreach ( @delLocations ) {
02680             $db->deleteLocation( $_ );
02681         }
02682         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
02683                    "Location" . (@delLocations > 1 ? 's ' : ' ') .
02684                    join(', ', @delLocations) . 
02685                    (@delLocations > 1 ? ' have ' : ' has ' ) . 
02686                    'been deleted.');
02687         $r->param('manage_location_action','none');
02688         $r->param('delete_location','');
02689     }
02690     $self->manage_location_form;
02691 }
02692 sub existsLocations_helper {
02693     my ($self, @locations) = @_;
02694     my $db = $self->r->db;
02695     foreach ( @locations ) {
02696         return $_ if ( ! $db->existsLocation($_) );
02697     }
02698     return 0;
02699 }
02700 
02701 sub edit_location_form {
02702     my $self = shift;
02703     my $r = $self->r;
02704     my $db = $r->db;
02705 
02706     my $locationID = $r->param("edit_location");
02707     if ( $db->existsLocation( $locationID ) ) {
02708         my $location = $db->getLocation($locationID);
02709         # this doesn't give that nice a sort for IP addresses,
02710         #    b/c there's the problem with 192.168.1.168 sorting 
02711         #    ahead of 192.168.1.2.  we could do better if we 
02712         #    either invoked Net::IP in the sort routine, or if
02713         #    we insisted on dealing only with IPv4.  rather than
02714         #    deal with either of those, we'll leave this for now
02715         my @locAddresses = sort { $a cmp $b }
02716             $db->listLocationAddresses($locationID);
02717 
02718         print CGI::h2("Editing location ", $locationID);
02719 
02720         print CGI::p({},"Edit the current value of the location ",
02721                  "description, if desired, then add and select ",
02722                  "addresses to delete, and then click the ", 
02723                  "\"Take Action\" button to make all of your ",
02724                  "changes.  Or, click \"Manage Locations\" ",
02725                  "above to make no changes and return to the ",
02726                  "Manage Locations page.");
02727 
02728         print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST",
02729                       -action=>$r->uri);
02730         print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02731         print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02732         print CGI::hidden(-name=>'edit_location',
02733                   -default=>$locationID);
02734         print CGI::hidden(-name=>'manage_location_action',
02735                   -default=>'edit_location_handler');
02736 
02737         print CGI::start_table();
02738         print CGI::Tr({-valign=>'top'},
02739             CGI::td({-colspan=>3},
02740                 "Location description: ", CGI::br(),
02741                 CGI::textfield(-name=>"location_description",
02742                            -size=>"50",
02743                            -default=>$location->description)));
02744         print CGI::Tr({-valign=>'top'},
02745             CGI::td({-width=>"50%"},
02746                 "Addresses to add to the location " .
02747                 "(enter one per line, as single IP addresses " .
02748                 "(e.g., 192.168.1.101), address masks " .
02749                 "(e.g., 192.168.1.0/24), or IP ranges " .
02750                 "(e.g., 192.168.1.101-192.168.1.150)):" . 
02751                 CGI::br() .
02752                 CGI::textarea({-name=>"new_location_addresses",
02753                            -rows=>5, -columns=>28})),
02754             CGI::td({}, "&nbsp;"),
02755             CGI::td({-width=>"50%"},
02756                 "Existing addresses for the location are " .
02757                 "given in the scrolling list below.  Select " .
02758                 "addresses from the list to delete them:" . 
02759                 CGI::br() .
02760                 CGI::scrolling_list(-name=>'delete_location_addresses',
02761                             -values=>[@locAddresses],
02762                             -size=>8,
02763                             -multiple=>'multiple') .
02764                 CGI::br() . "or: " .
02765                 CGI::checkbox(-name=>'delete_all_addresses',
02766                           -value=>'true',
02767                           -label=>'Delete all existing addresses')
02768                  ));
02769 
02770         print CGI::end_table();
02771 
02772         print CGI::p({},CGI::submit(-value=>'Take Action!'));
02773 
02774     } else {
02775         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02776                    "Location $locationID does not exist " .
02777                    "in the WeBWorK database.  Please check " .
02778                    "your input (perhaps you need to reload " .
02779                    "the location management page?).");
02780 
02781         $self->manage_location_form;
02782     }
02783 }
02784 
02785 sub edit_location_handler { 
02786     my $self = shift;
02787     my $r = $self->r;
02788     my $db = $r->db;
02789 
02790     my $locationID = $r->param("edit_location");
02791     my $locationDesc = $r->param("location_description");
02792     my $addAddresses = $r->param("new_location_addresses");
02793     my @delAddresses = $r->param("delete_location_addresses");
02794     my $deleteAll = $r->param("delete_all_addresses");
02795 
02796     # gut check
02797     if ( ! $locationID ) {
02798         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02799                    "No location specified to edit?! " .
02800                    "Please check your input data.");
02801         $self->manage_location_form;
02802 
02803     } elsif ( ! $db->existsLocation( $locationID ) ) {
02804         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02805                    "Location $locationID does not exist " .
02806                    "in the WeBWorK database.  Please check " .
02807                    "your input (perhaps you need to reload " .
02808                    "the location management page?).");
02809         $self->manage_location_form;
02810     } else {
02811         my $location = $db->getLocation($locationID);
02812 
02813         # get the current location addresses.  if we're deleting
02814         #   all of the existing addresses, we don't use this list 
02815         #   to determine which addresses to add, however.
02816         my @currentAddr = $db->listLocationAddresses($locationID);
02817         my @compareAddr = ( ! $deleteAll || $deleteAll ne 'true' )
02818             ? @currentAddr : ();
02819 
02820         my $doneMsg = '';
02821 
02822         if ($locationDesc && $location->description ne $locationDesc) {
02823             $location->description($locationDesc);
02824             $db->putLocation($location);
02825             $doneMsg .= CGI::p({},"Updated location description.");
02826         }
02827         # get the actual addresses to add out of the text field
02828         $addAddresses =~ s/\s*-\s*/-/g;
02829         $addAddresses =~ s/\s*\/\s*/\//g;
02830         my @addAddresses = split(/\s+/, $addAddresses);
02831 
02832         # make sure that we're adding and deleting only those 
02833         #    addresses that are not yet/currently in the location
02834         #    addresses
02835         my @toAdd = ();  my @noAdd = ();
02836         my @toDel = ();  my @noDel = ();
02837         foreach my $addr ( @addAddresses ) {
02838             if (grep {/^$addr$/} @compareAddr) {push(@noAdd,$addr);}
02839             else { push(@toAdd, $addr); }
02840         }
02841         if ( $deleteAll && $deleteAll eq 'true' ) {
02842             @toDel = @currentAddr;
02843         } else {
02844             foreach my $addr ( @delAddresses ) { 
02845                 if (grep {/^$addr$/} @currentAddr) {
02846                     push(@toDel,$addr);
02847                 } else { push(@noDel, $addr); }
02848             }
02849         }
02850 
02851         # and make sure that all of the addresses we're adding are 
02852         #    a sensible form
02853         my $badAddr = '';
02854         foreach my $addr ( @toAdd ) {
02855             unless ( new Net::IP($addr) ) {
02856                 $badAddr .= "$addr, ";
02857             }
02858         }
02859         $badAddr =~ s/, $//;
02860 
02861         # delete addresses first, because we allow deletion of 
02862         #    all existing addresses, then addition of addresses.
02863         #    note that we don't allow deletion and then addition 
02864         #    of the same address normally, however; in that case
02865         #    we'll end up just deleting the address.
02866         foreach ( @toDel ) {
02867             $db->deleteLocationAddress($locationID, $_);
02868         }
02869         foreach ( @toAdd ) {
02870             my $locAddr = $db->newLocationAddress;
02871             $locAddr->location_id($locationID);
02872             $locAddr->ip_mask($_);
02873 
02874             $db->addLocationAddress($locAddr);
02875         }
02876 
02877         my $addrMsg = '';
02878         $addrMsg .= "Deleted addresses " . join(', ', @toDel) .
02879             " from location." . CGI::br() if ( @toDel );
02880         $addrMsg .= "Added addresses " . join(', ', @toAdd) . 
02881             " to location $locationID.  " if ( @toAdd );
02882 
02883         my $badMsg = '';
02884         $badMsg .= 'Address(es) ' . join(', ', @noAdd) .
02885             " in the add list is(are) already in the " .
02886             "location $locationID, and so were " .
02887             "skipped." . CGI::br() if ( @noAdd );
02888         $badMsg .= "Address(es) $badAddr is(are) not in a " .
02889             "recognized form.  Please check your data " .
02890             "entry and try again." . CGI::br() if ( $badAddr );
02891         $badMsg .= 'Address(es) ' . join(', ', @noDel) . 
02892             " in the delete list is(are) not in the " .
02893             "location $locationID, and so were " .
02894             "skipped." if ( @noDel );
02895 
02896         print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"}, $badMsg)
02897             if ( $badMsg );
02898         if ( $doneMsg || $addrMsg ) {
02899             print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
02900                        CGI::p({}, $doneMsg, $addrMsg));
02901         } else {
02902             print CGI::div({-class=>"ResultsWithError"},
02903                        "No valid changes submitted for ",
02904                        "location $locationID.");
02905         }
02906 
02907         $self->edit_location_form;
02908     }
02909 }
02910 
02911 sub hide_inactive_course_form {
02912     my ($self) = @_;
02913     my $r = $self->r;
02914     my $ce = $r->ce;
02915 
02916     my $coursesDir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses};
02917     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
02918     my $hide_listing_format   = $r->param("hide_listing_format");
02919     unless (defined $hide_listing_format) {$hide_listing_format = 'last_login';}  #use the default
02920 #   warn "hide_listing_format is $hide_listing_format";
02921     
02922     # Get and store last modify time for login.log for all courses. Also get visibility status.
02923     my %courseLabels;
02924     my @noLoginLogIDs = ();
02925     my @loginLogIDs = ();
02926     my @hideCourseIDs = ();
02927     my ($loginLogFile, $epoch_modify_time, $courseDir);
02928     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
02929         $loginLogFile = "$coursesDir/$courseID/logs/login.log";
02930         if (-e $loginLogFile) {                 #this should always exist except for the model course
02931             $epoch_modify_time = stat($loginLogFile)->mtime;
02932             $coursesData{$courseID}{'epoch_modify_time'} = $epoch_modify_time;
02933             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = ctime($epoch_modify_time);
02934             push(@loginLogIDs,$courseID);
02935         } else {
02936             $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'} = 'no login.log';  #this should never be the case except for the model course
02937             push(@noLoginLogIDs,$courseID);
02938         }
02939         if (-f "$coursesDir/$courseID/hide_directory") {
02940             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'hidden';
02941         } else {    
02942             $coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} = 'visible';  
02943         }
02944         $courseLabels{$courseID} = "$courseID  ($coursesData{$courseID}{'status'} :: $coursesData{$courseID}{'local_modify_time'}) ";
02945     }
02946     if ($hide_listing_format eq 'last_login') {
02947         @noLoginLogIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @noLoginLogIDs; #this should be an empty arrey except for the model course
02948         @loginLogIDs = sort byLoginActivity @loginLogIDs;  # oldest first
02949         @hideCourseIDs = (@noLoginLogIDs,@loginLogIDs);
02950     } else { # in this case we sort alphabetically
02951         @hideCourseIDs = sort {lc($a) cmp lc ($b) } @courseIDs;
02952     }
02953     
02954     print CGI::h2("Hide Inactive courses");
02955     
02956         print CGI::p(  
02957          'Select the course(s) you want to hide (or unhide) and then click "Hide Courses" (or "Unhide Courses"). Hiding 
02958          a course that is already hidden does no harm (the action is skipped). Likewise unhiding a course that is 
02959          already visible does no harm (the action is skipped).  Hidden courses are still active but are not listed in 
02960          the list of WeBWorK courses on the opening page.  To access the course, an instructor or student must know the 
02961          full URL address for the course.'
02962     );
02963     
02964     print CGI::p(
02965         'Courses are listed either alphabetically or in order by the time of most recent login activity, oldest first.
02966         To change the listing order check the mode you want and click "Refresh Listing".  The listing format is: 
02967         Course_Name (status :: date/time of most recent login) where status is "hidden" or "visible".');
02968         
02969     
02970     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
02971 
02972     my %list_labels = (
02973                                 alphabetically => 'alphabetically', 
02974                                 last_login => 'by last login date', 
02975                                 );
02976                                             
02977     print CGI::table(
02978             CGI::Tr({},
02979             CGI::p("Select a listing format:"),
02980             CGI::radio_group(-name=>'hide_listing_format',
02981                                             -values=>['alphabetically', 'last_login'],
02982                                             -default=>'last_login',
02983                                             -labels=>\%list_labels,
02984                                             ),
02985             ),
02986         );                          
02987     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"hide_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), CGI::submit(-name=>"hide_course", -value=>"Hide Courses"),
02988     CGI::submit(-name=>"unhide_course", -value=>"Unhide Courses"));
02989     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
02990     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
02991     
02992     print CGI::p("Select course(s) to hide or unhide.");
02993     
02994     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
02995         CGI::Tr({},
02996             CGI::td(
02997                 CGI::scrolling_list(
02998                     -name => "hide_courseIDs",
02999                     -values => \@hideCourseIDs,
03000                     -size => 15,
03001                     -multiple => 1,
03002                     -labels => \%courseLabels,
03003                 ),
03004             ),
03005             
03006         ),
03007     );
03008     
03009     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"hide_course_refresh", -value=>"Refresh Listing"), CGI::submit(-name=>"hide_course", -value=>"Hide Courses"),
03010     CGI::submit(-name=>"unhide_course", -value=>"Unhide Courses"));
03011     
03012     print CGI::end_form();
03013 }

03015 sub hide_course_validate {
03016     my ($self) = @_;
03017     my $r = $self->r;
03018     my $ce = $r->ce;
03019     #my $db = $r->db;
03020     #my $authz = $r->authz;
03021     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
03022     
03023     my @hide_courseIDs     = $r->param("hide_courseIDs");
03024     @hide_courseIDs        = () unless @hide_courseIDs;
03025     
03026     my @errors;
03027     
03028     unless (@hide_courseIDs) {
03029         push @errors, "You must specify a course name.";
03030     } 
03031     return @errors;
03032 }

03034 
03035 sub do_hide_inactive_course {
03036     my ($self) = @_;
03037     my $r = $self->r;
03038     my $ce = $r->ce;
03039     
03040   my $coursesDir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses};
03041   
03042     my $hide_courseID;
03043     my @hide_courseIDs     = $r->param("hide_courseIDs");
03044     @hide_courseIDs        = () unless @hide_courseIDs;
03045 
03046   my $hideDirFileContent = 'Place a file named "hide_directory" in a course or other directory
03047 and it will not show up in the courses list on the WeBWorK home page.
03048 It will still appear in the Course Administration listing.';
03049     my @succeeded_courses = ();
03050     my $succeeded_count = 0;
03051     my @failed_courses = ();
03052     my $already_hidden_count = 0;
03053     
03054   foreach $hide_courseID (@hide_courseIDs) {
03055     my $hideDirFile = "$coursesDir/$hide_courseID/hide_directory";
03056     if (-f $hideDirFile) {
03057         $already_hidden_count++;
03058         next;
03059     } else {
03060         local *HIDEFILE;
03061         if (open (HIDEFILE, ">", $hideDirFile)) {  
03062             print HIDEFILE "$hideDirFileContent";
03063             close HIDEFILE;
03064             push @succeeded_courses,$hide_courseID;
03065             $succeeded_count++;
03066         } else {    
03067             push @failed_courses,$hide_courseID;
03068         }   
03069     }
03070   }
03071 
03072     if (@failed_courses) {
03073         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
03074             CGI::p("Errors occured while hiding the courses listed below when attempting to create the file hide_directory in the course's directory. 
03075 Check the ownership and permissions of the course's directory, e.g $coursesDir/$failed_courses[0]/"),
03076             CGI::p("@failed_courses"),
03077         );
03078     } 
03079     my $succeeded_message = '';
03080     
03081     if ($succeeded_count < 1 and $already_hidden_count > 0) {
03082         $succeeded_message = "Except for possible errors listed above, all selected courses are already hidden.";
03083     }   
03084     
03085     if ($succeeded_count) {
03086         if ($succeeded_count < 6) {
03087             $succeeded_message = "The following courses were successfully hidden: @succeeded_courses";
03088         } else {
03089             $succeeded_message = "$succeeded_count courses were successfully hidden.";
03090         }
03091     }
03092     if ($succeeded_count or $already_hidden_count) {
03093             print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
03094             CGI::p("$succeeded_message"),
03095         );
03096     }
03097 }
03098 
03099 sub unhide_course_validate {
03100     my ($self) = @_;
03101     my $r = $self->r;
03102     my $ce = $r->ce;
03103     #my $db = $r->db;
03104     #my $authz = $r->authz;
03105     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
03106     
03107     my @unhide_courseIDs     = $r->param("hide_courseIDs");
03108     @unhide_courseIDs        = () unless @unhide_courseIDs;
03109     
03110     my @errors;
03111     
03112     unless (@unhide_courseIDs) {
03113         push @errors, "You must specify a course name.";
03114     } 
03115     return @errors;
03116 }

03118 
03119 sub do_unhide_inactive_course {
03120     my ($self) = @_;
03121     my $r = $self->r;
03122     my $ce = $r->ce;
03123     
03124   my $coursesDir = $ce->{webworkDirs}->{courses};
03125   
03126     my $unhide_courseID;
03127     my @unhide_courseIDs     = $r->param("hide_courseIDs");
03128     @unhide_courseIDs        = () unless @unhide_courseIDs;
03129     
03130     my @succeeded_courses = ();
03131     my $succeeded_count = 0;
03132     my @failed_courses = ();
03133     my $already_visible_count = 0;
03134 
03135   foreach $unhide_courseID (@unhide_courseIDs) {
03136     my $hideDirFile = "$coursesDir/$unhide_courseID/hide_directory";
03137     unless (-f $hideDirFile) {
03138         $already_visible_count++;
03139         next;
03140     } 
03141     remove_tree("$hideDirFile", {error => \my $err});
03142     if (@$err) {
03143         push @failed_courses,$unhide_courseID;
03144     } else {
03145     push @succeeded_courses,$unhide_courseID;
03146         $succeeded_count++;
03147     }
03148   }
03149   my $succeeded_message = '';
03150   
03151   if ($succeeded_count < 1 and $already_visible_count > 0) {
03152         $succeeded_message = "Except for possible errors listed above, all selected courses are already unhidden.";
03153     }   
03154     
03155     if ($succeeded_count) {
03156         if ($succeeded_count < 6) {
03157             $succeeded_message = "The following courses were successfully unhidden: @succeeded_courses";
03158         } else {
03159             $succeeded_message = "$succeeded_count courses were successfully unhidden.";
03160         }
03161     }
03162     if ($succeeded_count or $already_visible_count) {
03163         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
03164         CGI::p("$succeeded_message"),
03165         );
03166     }   
03167     if (@failed_courses) {
03168         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
03169             CGI::p("Errors occured while unhiding the courses listed below when attempting delete the file hide_directory in the course's directory. 
03170 Check the ownership and permissions of the course's directory, e.g $coursesDir/$failed_courses[0]/"),
03171             CGI::p("@failed_courses"),
03172         );
03173     }   
03174 }

03190     return  q! 
03191     <center>
03192     <table class="messagebox" style="background-color:#FFFFCC;width:60%">
03193     <tr><td>
03194     !,
03195     CGI::p("If you are using your WeBWorK server for courses please help us out by registering your server."),
03196     CGI::p("We are often asked how many institutions are using WeBWorK and how many students are using
03197     WeBWorK  Since WeBWorK is open source and can be freely downloaded from ".
03198     CGI::a({href=>'http://webwork.maa.org'},'http://webwork.maa.org' ). " and ".
03199     CGI::a({href=> 'http://www.openwebwork.org'},'http://www.openwebwork.org'). ", it is frequently difficult for us to give a reasonable answer to this 
03200     question."),
03201     CGI::p("You can help by registering your current version of WeBWorK -- click the button, answer a few
03202     questions (the ones you can answer easily) and send the email.  It takes less than two minutes.  Thank you!. -- The WeBWorK Team"),
03203     q!
03204     </td>
03205     </tr>
03206     <tr><td align="center">
03207     !,
03208     CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink($self->r->urlpath, params=>{subDisplay=>"registration"})}, "Register"),
03209     q!
03210     </td></tr>
03211     </table>
03212     </center>
03213     !;
03214 }

03217     my $self = shift;
03218     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
03219     
03220     print "<center>";
03221     print  "\n",CGI::p({style=>"text-align: left; width:60%"},
03222     "\nPlease ",
03223     CGI::a({href=>'mailto:gage@math.rochester.edu?'
03224     .'subject=WeBWorK%20Server%20Registration'
03225     .'&body='
03226     .uri_escape("Thanks for registering your WeBWorK server.  We'd appreciate if you would answer
03227     as many of these questions as you can conveniently.  We need this data so we can better 
03228     answer questions such as 'How many institutions have webwork servers?' and 'How many students
03229     use WeBWorK?'.  Your email and contact information  will be kept private.  We will 
03230     list your institution as one that uses WeBWorK unless you tell us to keep that private as well.
03231     \n\nThank you. \n\n--Mike Gage \n\n
03232     ")
03233     .uri_escape("Server URL: ".$ce->{apache_root_url}." \n\n")
03234     .uri_escape("WeBWorK version: $main::VERSION \n\n")
03235     .uri_escape("Institution name (e.g. University of Rochester): \n\n")
03236     .uri_escape("Contact person name: \n\n")
03237     .uri_escape("Contact email: \n\n")
03238     .uri_escape("Approximate number of courses run each term: \n\n")
03239     .uri_escape("Approximate number of students using this server each term: \n\n")
03240     .uri_escape("Other institutions who use WeBWorK courses hosted on this server: \n\n")
03241     .uri_escape("Other comments: \n\n")
03242     },
03243     'click here'),
03244     q! to open your email application.  There are a few questions, some of which have already
03245     been filled in for your installation.  Fill in the other questions which you can answer easily and send
03246     the email to gage@math.rochester.edu
03247     !
03248     );
03249     
03250     
03251     
03252     print  "\n",CGI::p({style=>"text-align: left; width:60%"},q!Once you have emailed your registration information you can hide the "registration" banner 
03253     for successive visits by clicking
03254     the button below. It writes an empty file (!.CGI::code('registered_versionNumber').q!) to the directory !.CGI::code('..../courses/admin')
03255     );
03256     
03257     print "</center>";
03258     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$self->r->uri);
03259     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
03260     print $self->hidden_fields("subDisplay");
03261     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"register_site", -label=>"Site has been registered"));
03262     print CGI::end_form();
03263 }
03264
