03266 
03267 sub do_registration {
03268     my $self = shift;
03269     my $ce   = $self->r->ce;
03270     my $registered_file_path = $ce->{courseDirs}->{root}."/$registered_file_name";
03271     # warn qq!`echo "info" >$registered_file_path`!;
03272     `echo "info" >$registered_file_path`;
03273     
03274     print  "\n<center>",CGI::p({style=>"text-align: left; width:60%"},q{Registration action completed.  Thank you very much for registering WeBWorK!"});
03275     
03276     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$self->r->uri);
03277     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
03278     print CGI::p({style=>"text-align: center"}, CGI::submit(-name=>"registration_completed", -label=>"Continue"));
03279     print CGI::end_form();
03280     print "</center>";
03281 
03282 }
03283 ################################################################################
03284 # Utilities
03285 ################################################################################
03286 sub formatReportOnDatabaseTables {
03287     my ($tables_ok,$dbStatus) =  @_;
03288     
03289     # print db status
03290     
03291         my %msg =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in schema but missing in database"),
03292                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Table defined in database but missing in schema"),
03293                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," Table is ok "),
03294                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database table definitions do not agree "),
03295         );
03296         my %msg2 =(    WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A        => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in database"),
03297                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B         => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," missing in schema"),
03298                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B   => CGI::span({style=>"color:green"}," is ok "),
03299                       WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B => CGI::span({style=>"color:red"}," Schema and database field definitions do not agree "),
03300         );
03301         my $all_tables_ok=1;
03302         my $extra_database_tables=0;
03303         my $extra_database_fields=0;
03304         my $str ='';
03305         $str .= CGI::start_ul();
03306         foreach my $table (sort keys %$dbStatus) {
03307             my $table_status = $dbStatus->{$table}->[0];
03308             $str .= CGI::li( CGI::b($table) .  $msg{ $table_status } );
03309             
03310             CASE: {
03311                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::SAME_IN_A_AND_B 
03312                     && do{ last CASE;
03313                     };
03314                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A
03315                     && do{
03316                            $all_tables_ok = 0; last CASE;
03317                     };
03318                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B
03319                     && do{
03320                            $extra_database_tables = 1; last CASE;
03321                     };
03322                 $table_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B
03323                     && do{ 
03324                         my %fieldInfo = %{ $dbStatus->{$table}->[1] };
03325                         $str .=CGI::start_ul();
03326                         foreach my $key (keys %fieldInfo) {
03327                             my $field_status = $fieldInfo{$key}->[0];
03328                             CASE2: {
03329                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_B 
03330                                     && do{ 
03331                                        $extra_database_fields = 1; last CASE2;
03332                                     };
03333                                 $field_status == WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck::ONLY_IN_A 
03334                                     && do{ 
03335                                        $all_tables_ok=0; last CASE2;
03336                                     };                          
03337                             }
03338                             $str .= CGI::li("Field $key => ". $msg2{$field_status });
03339                         }
03340                         $str .= CGI::end_ul();
03341                     };
03342             }
03343             
03344             
03345         }
03346         $str.=CGI::end_ul();
03347         $str .= ($all_tables_ok)?CGI::p("Database tables are ok") : "";
03348         return ($all_tables_ok, $extra_database_tables, $extra_database_fields, $str);
03349 }
03350 1;
